content: No bat on it! Flatter and with a bit of flight, outside off, turns away. Dhananjaya de Silva looks to defend but seems to miss it. Bangladesh appeal as they heard a murmur and take it upstairs. UltraEdge shows no spike on it. Not out! Hang on, Najmul Hossain Shanto have decided that's it. Time to shake hands. The game ends in a draw...
Tossed up on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva dead bats it on the deck.
Floats it full and around off, Dhananjaya de Silva taps it in front of the man at silly point.
Fuller delivery outside off, this is pushed to cover.
Tossed up on middle and comes with the arm. Dhananjaya de Silva defends right in front of his pads.
Shapes in a full ball on middle. Dhananjaya de Silva clips it to short leg.
FOUR! Crunched away! Flighted full and well outside off. Mendis hits it through covers for a boundary.
Bowls it full and outside off, turns in. Mendis defends it out.
Comes back and targets the top of off. Kamindu Mendis solidly denies it.
Bowls it full and well outside off. Mendis offers no shot.
This is full and around off, pushed to cover.
Loops it up full and on off, Mendis blocks.
Tossed up on middle and leg, turns in. Dhananjaya de Silva defends just inside the line.
Fuller delivery on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva defends close to his pads.
Tossed up on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva defends.

CHANCE! Needed something special to hold on. Flighted very full and outside off, Mendis skips down and smashes it off the toe end to mid off where Mushfiqur Rahim dives to his left but loses the sight of the ball right in the end. A single.
Fuller delivery, outside off, pushed to cover.
Tossed up, well outside off. Mendis skips down to defend and taps it just in front of the silly point.
SIX! BANG! Nayeem Hasan bowls fuller delivery again on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva stands tall and launches it over long on for a six.
Flights it full and around off. Dhananjaya de Silva gets forward to defend.
Flatter delivery, outside off. Dhananjaya de Silva punches it through covers for a couple of runs.
Tossed up, full and around off, Dhananjaya de Silva again solidly defends it.
Bowls it very full and on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva goes back and blocks.
FOUR! Too straight from Nayeem Hasan, this is on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva drills it down to long on and it rolls to the fence. The skipper is off the mark.
Very full and on middle and off. Mendis leans and blocks.
Taijul Islam bowls it outside the line.Mendis walks down and across to keep it out.
Quicker and fuller around off, Mendis dead bats it.
Flatter and on off, turning in. Mendis hangs back and blocks.
Floats it full and well outside off, Mendis steps across and defends it out.
Too full and in the slot for Mendis who crunches it past mid off for a couple of runs.
On a length and on leg. Dhananjaya de Silva goes back and tucks it off the pads to short fine leg.
Tossed up on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva blocks.
THREE RUNS! Pitched up, outside off. Mendis drives it through point. The ball dies in the deep and the batters take three by then.
Loops it up and inites Mendis forward to defend.
This is full and outside off. Mendis steps across and blocks it.
Tossed up on middle, this is blocked out.
Floats it full and on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva solidly blocks it out.
Tossed up on off, Dhananjaya de Silva pushes it to mid off.
Bowls it full and on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva half presses and blocks it out.
Tad short and outside off, this is cut to point for a single.
Tossed up on middle, Mendis lunges and defends on the deck.
Bowls it full and on middle and off. Mendis goes back and taps it late on the off side.
Flatter delivery on leg, Dhananjaya de Silva looks to flick but misses.

A huge appeal for LBW but turned down. Looks very close! Tossed up, around off from around the wicket, it lands and straightens off the deck. Dhananjaya de Silva goes back to defend but misses and gets hit on the pads. Najmul Hossain Shanto is not convinced enough to take it upstairs.
Floats a bit and lands it full on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva leans to defend.
Tossed up, outside off, Dhananjaya de Silva knocks it to point.
Flatter and around off, Dhananjaya de Silva goes back and blocks.
Flighted full and on middle, Mendis nudges it to mid-wicket for a single.
Too full and floated on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva dead bats it. A wicket-maiden over by Taijul Islam.
Another solid defensive shot from Dhananjaya de Silva.
An arm ball, full and on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva defends on the deck.
Floats it full and on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva leans and defends it out.
This is full and on middle, Dhananjaya de Silva blocks.

OUT! GONE! Bangladesh are not giving up yet. Beautifully bowled! Angles in a full ball around middle and draws Dinesh Chandimal forward to defend it but the ball turns away, past his edge and crashes the off pole. Wonderful from Taijul Islam.
Dinesh Chandimal b T Islam 6 (44b 0x4 0x6)
Floats it full and outside off. Mendis pushes with gentle hands to point.
Flighted full and on off, Mendis pushes it to cover.
Too full and around off, Mendis lunges forward and blocks.
Tossed up, around off. Mendis defends on the front foot.
Floats it full and around off, Mendis leans and blocks it out.
A low full toss on middle, Dinesh Chandimal eases it to mid on for a single.
Shortish and on middle, Kamindu Mendis steers it to point. Maiden over!
Slows it up, full and on off, Kamindu Mendis defends it on the front foot.
Quicker, short and outside off, Kamindu Mendis leaves it alone.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Kamindu Mendis strides out to block it out.
Flighted, full and on off, Kamindu Mendis taps it to the off side.
Floated, short and on off, Kamindu Mendis steps across and keeps it out to the off side.
Fires one full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal is solid in his defense.
Flatter, full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal clips it to mid-wicket.
On off, kept out.
Quicker, full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal keeps it out.
Tossed up, full and on off, Dinesh Chandimal fends it away.
Flighted, full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal knocks it to mid on.
Floated, full and on middle, Kamindu Mendis blocks it out.

OUT! TAKEN! Taijul Islam gets a huge wicket here! Angelo Mathews walks back for the final time in Test cricket and takes in all the applause from the opposition players and the crowd. Arm ball, full and on midle, angling in, AM looks to play but gets an inside edge onto his pads. The ball pops up wide of silly point where Mominul Haque shows great reflexes and takes a sharp catch to his right with one hand. Sri Lanka three down now! Also, Kamindu Mendis is the next man in.
Angelo Mathews c M Haque b T Islam 8 (45b 1x4 0x6)

Quicker, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews looks to block it out but misses and gets hit on the pads. There is an appeal for LBW, but turned down. Najmul Hossain Shanto takes the review, but Ball Tracking shows that it has pitched outside leg.
Flatter, full and on leg, turns away, Angelo Mathews pads it away. A slight appeal for LVWm but turned down.
Shortish and on off, Dinesh Chandimal steers it to point.
Slows it up, full and on leg, Dinesh Chandimal pads it away.
Maiden over! Slows it up, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews keeps it out.
Flatter, full and on middle and off, Angelo Mathews defends it on the front foot.
Slows it up, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews fends it away.
Tossed up, full and on off, Angelo Mathews blocks it out.
Flighted, full and on off, Angelo Mathews clips it to mid-wicket.
Floated, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews blocks it out.
Tossed up, full and on off, Dinesh Chandimal defeds it on the front footl.
Short again and on middle, Angelo Mathews nudges it to mid-wicket for a single.
Quicker, short and on middle, Angelo Mathews pats it to short mid-wicket.
Flighted, full and on off, Angelo Mathews taps it to silly point.
Flatter, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews taps it to short covers.
Floated, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews blocks it out down the pitch.
Fires one full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal defends it on the front foot.
Flighted, full and on off, Dinesh Chandimal blocks it out on the front foot.
Slows it up, full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal fends it on the front foot,
Quicker, short and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal clips it to mid-wicket.
Floated, full and on off, Dinesh Chandimal pushes it to covers.
Flatter, full and around off, Dinesh Chandimal leaves it alone.
Flighted, full and on off, Angelo Mathews is solid in his defense.
Flatter, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews tucks it to mid-wicket.
Slows it up, full andon off, Angelo Mathews taps it to off side.
Fires one full, on middle, Angelo Mathews fends it away.
Floated, full and on off, Angelo Mathews taps it to short covers.
FOUR! Nice shot! Flatter, short and on leg, Angelo Mathews flicks it off with amazing timing to deep sqaure leg for a lovely boundary.
Slows it up, full and around off, Dinesh Chandimal lets it go to the keeper.
Quicker, full and on off, Dinesh Chandimal steers it to point.
Tossed up, full and on off, Dinesh Chandimal fends it off the inner half of the bat to mid-wicket,
Flighted, full and on off, Dinesh Chandimal drives it through covers for a brace.
Floated, full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal blocks it out.
Flatter, full and around off, Dinesh Chandimal leaves it alone.
Short and on off, Angelo Mathews punches it to cover-point. Another maiden!
Fires one full and on leg, Angelo Mathews clips it to square leg.
Loopy, full and on off, Angelo Mathews defends it on the front foot.
Flighted, full and on off, Angelo Mathews taps it to silly point.
Floated, full and on off, Angelo Mathews knocks it down the pitch.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews blocks it out.
Slows it up, full and on off, Dinesh Chandimal is solid in his defense.
Darts one full, on middle, Dinesh Chandimal keeps it out.
Fires one full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal blocks it out.
Flatter, full and down the leg, Dinesh Chandimal pads it away.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews eases it to long on for a run.
Floated, full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal guides it off the outer half of the bat to third man for a single.
Drags his length back, on middle, Angelo Mathews pats it to the bowler.
Slows it up, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews defends it on the front foot.
Flatter, full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal tucks it to mid-wicket for a single.
Floated, full and on off, Dinesh Chandimal taps it to silly point.
Arm ball, full and on leg, angling in, Dinesh Chandimal misses his flick and gets hit on the pads. A slight appeal for LBW, but turned down.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal knocks it back to the bowler.
Fires one full and on leg, Angelo Mathews turns it to the leg side. Back-to-back maidens!
Shortish and around off, Angelo Mathews steers it to point.
Flighted, full and on off, Angelo Mathews clips it to mid-wicket.
Flatter, short and on off, Angelo Mathews bunts it out to the off side.
Flighted, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews blocks it out.
Floated, full and on middle, Angelo Mathews clips it to square leg.
Slows it up, full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal knocks it to the right of the bowler. Maiden over!
Flighted, full and on off, Dinesh Chandimal looks to blocks but gets an inside egde to the leg side.
Fires one full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal fends it away.
Flatter, short and on off, Dinesh Chandimal punches it to short covers.
Floated, full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal taps it to point.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal knocks it down the pitch.
Dragged back, on off, Angelo Mathews punches it through extra covers for a brace.
Shorter in length again, on middle, Angelo Mathews nudges it to short mid-wicket again.
Quicker, short and on middle, Angelo Mathews pats it to short mid-wicket.
Flatter, short and on middle, turns in sharply, Angelo Mathews tries to pad it away but misses.
Flatter, short and on middle, Angelo Mathews blocks it out.
Floated, full and on leg, Angelo Mathews pads it away.
First maiden by Islam! Flighted on off, Dinesh Chandimal drives it to mid off. THAT WILL BE TEA!
Nicely floated on the pads. Dinesh Chandimal works it to square leg.
Tossed up on middle, turns away. Dinesh Chandimal defends off the higher part of the blade.
Very full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal drills it to mid on. He calls for a quick single but denies it eventually.
Flatter and angling on middle and leg. Dinesh Chandimal goes back to flick but misses and gets hit on the pads.
Bowls it full and on middle, Dinesh Chandimal flicks it to mid-wicket.
Flighted full and quicker on middle, Mathews nudges it on the leg side.
Tossed up on middle, Mathews flicks it to short leg who collects on a bounce.
Looped up on middle, Mathews turns it past short leg for no run.
Bowls it full and on middle and leg. Angelo Mathews turns it to mid-wicket.

OUT! TAKEN! Pathum Nissanka has gifted away his wicket! Nicely bowled by Hasan! Tosses it up and bowls it full and on middle, Nissanka tries to work on the leg side but the ball straightens up and he ends up chipping it to short mid-wicket where Najmul Hossain Shanto takes a dolly. Two wickets in three balls. Both the openers are back in the hut.
Pathum Nissanka c NH Shanto b N Hasan 24 (25b 4x4 0x6)
Slightly short from Nayeem Hasan to start his spell, around off, Nissanka pulls it to deep mid-wicket for a couple.

OUT! STUMPED! Taijul Islam draws the first blood! Invites Lahiru Udara forward as he loops this on a length and around off, it lands and spins away. Lahiru Udara defends inside the line and gets beaten on the outside edge. It goes past and the keeper quickly clips the bails off. Much needed for Bangladesh as Sri Lanka started on a good note.
Lahiru Udara st L Das b T Islam 9 (13b 2x4 0x6)
The arm ball, comes with an angle on middle, Lahiru Udara looks to defend but inside edges it onto the pads.
Tossed up full and around off, Lahiru Udara prods and defends.
Tossed up on middle, Nissanka flicks it to deep mid-wicket for one.
FOUR! Sri Lanka are aggressive here. Very full and floated on middle, Nissanka skips down and launches it down the ground for a boundary.
Flatter and outside off, Nissanka punches it to cover.
Overpitched and outside off, Nissanka creams it through covers for a single.

FOUR! MISFIELD! Bangladesh shouldn't take this lightly! Shorter and on middle, Nissanka pulls it to deep mid-wicket where the fielder runs to his left and slides but the ball rolls under his hands and into the fence.
Touch fuller and outside off. Nissanka gets his front foot out and defends.
Spills it full and down the leg side. Nissanka looks to flick but misses.
FOUR! Lovely shot! Pitched up, outside off, Nissanka leans into his drive and plays it through covers. Najmul Hossain Shanto runs from mid off, does all the hard work but fails to flick it back.
Hasan Mahmud offers a bit of width outside off. Nissanka slaps but finds the man at cover.
Slows the pace and bowls it full, around off. Lahiru Udara leans and blocks.
Bowls it full and around the fifth stump line. Lahiru Udara nudges it to mid-wicket.
Slightly short and outside off, Nissanka cuts it to deep point for a single.
Tossed up on off, Nissanka knocks it to cover.
Floats it full and on off, Nissanka steps down and pushes it to cover.
FOUR! Taijul Islam drops it slightly short and on middle, NIssanka picks the length and pulls it through mid-wicket for a boundary.
Drifts in a full ball on middle, Nissanka whips it behind square leg for a single.
Good length ball, outside off. Nissanka hits well but straight to cover.
Hasan Mahmud goes a touch fuller, outside off, shapes away. Nissanka punches it to cover.
BEAUTY! Angles in a length ball, around off. Nissanka had to play that but the ball swings away and goes past the edge.
Short of a length and outside off, Nissanka looks to push it away but misses.
Leg bye! Serves it full and angling on the pads. Lahiru Udara misses his flick and it rolls to the leg side for a leg bye.
This one skids off the surface, outside off, knocked to covers.
Tossed up on middle and leg. Lahiru Udara flicks it to deep square leg for a single.
Flat and outside off, Lahiru Udara punches well but to the left of mid off.
BEATEN! LOVELY! Floats it full and outside off, bit of turn. Lahiru Udara looks to defend but misses.
Floated outside off, Nissanka drives it to long off for a single.
Slightly short and outside off, Nissanka cuts it to point.
FOUR! Sri Lanka are up and running in the chase! Wonderful shot again! Hasan Mahmud gives width and Lahiru Udara strokes it through cover-point for a boundary.
FOUR! Lahiru Udara is off the mark! Nice shot! Length ball, outside off. Lahiru Udara punches it square on the off side for a boundary.
This is full and around off, Lahiru Udara leans and blocks to cover.
On a nagging length and around off. Lahiru Udara gets inside the line and defends.
Sri Lanka are underway in a streaky manner! Good length delivery, outside off and nips in. Nissanka looks to push but inside edges it to fine leg for a single.
Hasan Mahmud starts with a short of a length delivery, outside off. Nissanka looks to cut but misses.
Slows it up, full and on middle, turns away, Nayeem Hasan looks to push it away but misses. Hang on! There comes the declaration from Bangladesh!
Floated, full and on middle, Nayeem Hasan reverse sweeps it to point.
Shortish and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto works it to deep mid-wicket for one.
Flighted, full and on middle, Nayeem Hasan clips it through mid-wicket for one.
Short and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto nudges it through mid-wicket for a single.
SIX! Najmul Hossain Shanto is taking on the attack now. Tossed up, full and middle and leg. Shanto skips down the track and dispatches it over the long fence for half a dozen more.
Another shorter delivery, on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto flicks it to deep mid-wicket for one.
Looped up, full and on middle, Nayeem Hasan lofts it on the bounce to long on for one.
Short and around off, Najmul Hossain Shanto steers it through point for a single.

SIX! Another one! Flighted, full and on middle and off, Najmul Hossain Shanto once again dances down the track and launches it over the long off fence for another biggie. Bangladesh lead by 283 runs now!
Short and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto punches it wide of long on for a brace.
SIX! BANG! More intent! Tossed up, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto skips down the track to get to the pitch of it and tonks it over the long on fence for a biggie.
Flatter, full and on middle and leg, Nayeem Hasan pads it away.
Quicker, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto swipes it through square leg for one.
Flighted, full and on middle, Nayeem Hasan sweeps it to deep square leg for one.
Slows it up, full and on leg, Nayeem Hasan pads it away.

HUNDRED FOR SHANTO! Twin centuries for the Bangladeshi skipper, and he has joined an elite list. A brilliant knock from the southpaw, and he has led his country from the front. Tossed up, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto reverse sweeps it through point for one. He jumps and punches in the air to celebrate and takes in all the applause.
Floated, full and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto clips it to square leg.
Flighted, full and on middle, Nayeem Hasan blocks it out. Another maiden!
Slows it up, full and on leg, Nayeem Hasan pads it away.
Flatter, full and on middle and leg, Nayeem Hasan looks to sweep it away but misses.
Floated, full and on leg, Nayeem Hasan tucks it to mid-wicket.
Short and on leg, Nayeem Hasan fails to glance it away.
Short and down the leg side, Nayeem Hasan tucks it to the leg side.
Flatter, full and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto paddles it to short fine.
Tossed up, full and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto taps it to the off side.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto goes for the reverse sweep. Kusal Mendis anticipates it early, moves to his left but still fails to grab it. Two taken.
Short and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto clips it to mid-wicket.
Flatter, short and down the leg side, Najmul Hossain Shanto misses his flick.
Floated, full and on leg, Nayeem Hasan sweeps it to deep square leg for a single.
Looped up, full and on off, Nayeem Hasan knocks it to mid off for one.
Quicker, short and on middle, Nayeem Hasan nudges it to square leg.
Slower through the air, full and leg, Nayeem Hasan tucks it to the leg side.
Tossed up, full and on leg, turns away, Nayeem Hasan blocks it out.
Floated, full and on middle, Nayeem Hasan drills it to mid off.
Floated, full and on middle and leg, Nayeem Hasan clips it to sqaure leg.
Slows it up, full and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto turns to the leg side.
Flighted, full and on leg, Nayeem Hasan paddles it to fine leg for one.
Flatter, full and around leg, Nayeem Hasan lets hit him on the pads.
Floated, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto pushes it towards covers for a single.
Short again, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto dabs it to point.
Short and on middle, Nayeem Hasan nudges it through mid-wicket for a single.
Quicker, full and on middle and leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto keeps it out again. MAIDEN OVER!
Slows it up, full and on middle again, Najmul Hossain Shanto defends it on the front foot.
Flatter, full and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto tucks it to the leg side.
Flighted, full and on middle and leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto defends it on the front foot.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto pushes it back to the bowler.
Floated, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto blocks it out.

OUT! STUMPED! Tharindu Rathnayake strikes again! The pitch has suddenly started to turn sharply here. Tossed up, full and around leg, turns away massively. Jaker Ali tries to flick it away but gets completely deceived by the spin. The ball goes through to the keeper where Kusal Mendis just about breaks the stumps. Ali is well short of his crease. Bangladesh six down now!
Jaker Ali st K Mendis b T Rathnayake 2 (7b 0x4 0x6)
Flighted, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto knocks it to the right of the bowler for one.
Slows it up, shortish and on middle, turns away, Jaker Ali moves back and steers it to third man for one.
Short and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto punches it through covers for another run.
Floated, full and on off, Jaker Ali pushes it through covers for a run.
A full toss, on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto goes down and reverse sweeps it to deep point for a single.
Gives this one some more air, full and on leg, turns away, Jaker Ali goes for the sweep but misses.
Flatter, full and on middle, Jaker Ali fends it away.
Slows it up, full and on leg, Jaker Ali defends it on the front foot.
Flighted, full and on middle, Jaker Ali blocks it out.
Tossed, full and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto paddles it to short fine for a run.

DROPPED! A big chance goes begging! Floated, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto goes down and sweeps it, but fails to keep it down. Lahiru Udara at square leg flies to the right, gets both hands on it, but spills it out. Two taken.

OUT! BOWLED'EM! Tharindu Rathnayake bowls a beauty here! He tosses it up, full and around middle, grips and turns away sharply. Litton Das backs away to push it away but plays completely down the wrong line. The ball spins past the outside edge and rattles the stumps. Bangladesh are 241/5, leading by 251 runs!
Litton Das (wk) b T Rathnayake 3 (5b 0x4 0x6)
Slows it up, full and on leg again, turns away, Litton Das tucks it to short mid-wicket.
Flighted, full and on leg, Litton Das turns to the leg side.
Floated, full and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto goes down and sweeps it to deep square leg for a run.
Goes short and on off, Litton Das steers it to point for a single.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Litton Das backs away and drives it through covers for a brace.

OUT! RUN OUT! A bit of lack of judgment, and that has cost Mushfiqur Rahim his wicket here. Prabath Jayasuriya tosses it up, full and on middle. Mushfiqur Rahim drills it towards mid on and sets off for the run. Tharindu Rathnayake quickly pounces on the ball and, in one motion, fires in a throw to hit the stumps at the bowler's end. Rahim looks confident, but after watching the replays, he starts to walk back here. He misses out on a half-century by just one run, and the big 109-run stand has been broken. Finally something to cheer about for the Lankans!
Mushfiqur Rahim run out (Tharindu Rathnayake) 49 (102b 4x4 0x6)

A slight appeal for bat pad, but turned down! Flighted, full and on middle and leg, Mushfiqur Rahim goes down for the sweep but misses as the ball lobs up off his forearm. Kamindu Mendis at first slip gobbles it. but the umpire shakes his head.
Shortish and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim moves back and pats it down the pitch.
Floated, full and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto goes down and reverse sweeps it through point for a run.
Goes short and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim punches it through covers for a single.
Flighted, full and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim tucks it to the leg side, Shanto wants the run but is sent back and rightly so.
Gives this one some more air, full and on middle again, Najmul Hossain Shanto fends it on the front foot.
Flighted, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto defends it on the front foot.
Quicker one,full and on middle and leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto keeps it out nicely.
Tossed up, full and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto turns it to the leg side.
Flatter, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto still defends it on the back foot.
Floated, short and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto moves back and guides it with an open face of the bat towards point for a couple of runs. Excellent running!

CHANCE! Flighted full and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim looks to paddle but top edges it right in front of him. Prabath Jayasuriya runs but he stops as he sees the keeper running forward but Kusal Mendis falls late as the ball drops down in front of him.
Floated on middle, Shanto reverse hits it to point for one more.
Shorter and outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim punches it to cover for a single.
Loops it up around off. Shanto reverse hits it to deep point for a single.
Bowls it full and on middle and leg, nudged to square leg.
Flights it very full and on middle, Shanto blocks on the front foot.
Tossed up on leg, Mushfiqur Rahim nudges it to square leg.
Down the leg side once again, Mushfiqur Rahim pads it away.
Bowls it on the leg side, turning in. Mushfiqur Rahim pads it away.
Flights it full and down leg. Shanto picks up and reverse paddles it to third man for one.
Tossed up on the pads, Shanto flicks it to square leg.
Tharindu Rathnayake goes full and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim reverse sweeps it to point for a single.
Goes a bit full and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim sweeps it to square leg for a single.
Very full and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it to short mid off.
Not much turn seen! Flighted on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim presses forward to defend.
Floated on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim leans and blocks.
Floats it full and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim brings out the reverse hit but bottom edges it and it rolls to the man at first slip.
Tossed up on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it out.
Too full and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim hits it to long off for a single.
Floated on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim prods and blocks.
On middle, Shanto paddles it to square leg for a single.
FOUR! FINE SHOT! Bangladesh playing well! This is full and outside off. Shanto creams it through covers for a boundary.
Floated on middle, blocked out.
Very full and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim drills it to long on for a single.
More sweep shots! This time by Mushfiqur Rahim as he plays it to square leg.
Najmul Hossain Shanto sweeps again to fine leg for a run.
This is full and on middle, Shanto sweeps it to deep square leg for a couple more.
Fuller delivery on middle, this is blocked out.
Shanto opts to sweep again but the line is well outside off and he misses.
Tosses it full and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim paddles it to square leg and rotates the strike.
Tossed up, outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim strokes it to cover for a single.
Tad short and outside off, Shanto punches it to cover for a single.
Tossed up on off, Shanto pushes it to mid off.
Floated full on middle, Shanto gets inside the line and sweeps it to fine leg for a couple.
Flatter and angling on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim nudges it to mid-wicket for one.
Goes very full and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim hangs back to defend.
Floated full and around off, blocked out.
Loops up a full ball on middle, Shanto flicks it to square leg.
Tossed up around off, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it to covers for a single.
Flighted full and around off. Mushfiqur Rahim dead bats it.
Another sweep shot by the skipper. On middle, fuller and Shanto sweeps it to fine leg for one.
Floats it full on middle, Shanto bunts it to mid-wicket.
Very full and around off, Shanto sweeps it to square leg for a single.
Tossed up on off, Shanto prods and blocks.
Tharindu Rathnayake has come the closest to creating a chance! Floated outside off and it spins away. Shanto leans to defend but misses.
Flights it well outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim drives it square on the off side for one.
Angles it full and on middle, blocked out.
Bowls it full and outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim gets his pads across and leaves.
Tossed up on middle, flicked to mid-wicket for a single.
Flights it full and on off, played back to the bowler.
Floated around off, angling in. Shanto turns it to long on for a single.
This is full and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim knocks it to covers for a single.
Flighted on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim sweeps it behind square leg for a couple of runs.
Prabath Jayasuriya serves it full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim nicely comes forward to defend.
On middle, fuller and Shanto prods to defend.
Slides in a fuller delivery on off, Shanto watchfully blocks.
Najmul Hossain Shanto goes back and defends it on the deck.
Goes full and into the rough, spins in. Shanto equally defends well.
Outside off with a bit of width. Shanto hits well but straight to point.
Tossed up on middle, Shanto leans and blocks.
TWO MORE! Looped up on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim flicks it to deep square leg for a couple. 200 up for Bangladesh!
Flighted outside off, drilled to long on for a single.
Too full and drifting on leg, Shanto sweeps it fine to fine leg for a couple of runs.
Slightly full and turning in on off. Shanto solidly defends it.
Tossed up on middle and off. Shanto prods and blocks well.
Floats it full and on middle, Shanto leans and defends.
Touch fuller and around off, nips in. Mushfiqur Rahim defends besides his pads.
On a nagging length and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim taps it onto the deck.
Very full and angling on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim flicks it onto the leg side.
Length and on middle, defended out.
FOUR! In the gap! Good length ball with a lot of width. Mushfiqur Rahim goes back and strokes it past cover for a boundary.
This is full and outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim pushes it to cover.

A dot to end the over as Shanto attempts a reverse hit but finds the man at point. Actually, it went aerially straight to the man at point who is standing very close with a helmet on but he fails to hold onto his right.
Tossed up around off and spins away. Shanto gets inside the line to defend.
Slants it full and on the pads. Shanto watchfully defends it.
Too full and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim plays with a straight bat to long off for one.
Angles in a full ball on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim comes forward to keep it out.
Tossed up around off. Mushfiqur Rahim defends with gentle hands.
Pushes it full and angling on off. Shanto blocks to end the over.
Keeps it full and around off, Shanto half presses to defend it.
On a good length and around middle and off. Shanto blocks.
This is full and outside off, Shanto drives it straight to cover.
Length ball, outside off, Shanto taps with soft hands to the man at gully.
FOUR! SHOT! Touch fuller and around off, Shanto picks up the length and lofts it above the bowler's head for a boundary.
Bowls it full and close to the off pole. Mushfiqur Rahim punches it to cover.
Tossed up on middle, blocked out.
Serves it full and flighted on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim looks to defend but inside edges it onto the pads.
Goes full and on middle and leg. Mushfiqur Rahim dead bats it.
Too full and outside off, driven to long off for a single.
Nicely bowled! Floated around off, and makes it to spin away. Shanto prods to defend but is beaten.
Tad fuller and on middle and off. Mushfiqur Rahim presses forward to defend.
Nips one back in on the fuller side on off. Mushfiqur Rahim prods and blocks.
Shapes away a length ball after landing it outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim leaves.
A good length ball on middle. Mushfiqur Rahim solidly blocks it out.
Slants across a length ball on middle, this is turned to square leg for one.
FOUR! Intent straight up from the Bangladeshi skipper! Pitched up, outside off. Shanto leans across and drives it down to mid off for a boundary.
Flatter and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim goes back and punches it to point.
FOUR! First runs of the day! These two have added more than 50 now! Floated outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim smashes it to mid off where the fielder dives to his right but fails to stop.
Slightly short and outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it to mid off.
Floats it full and on middle, drilled to mid on.
Tossed up full and around off. Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it out.

Chance straight up! Shorter and outside off, dips a bit. Rahim looks to cut but bottom edges and it deflects back onto the boots of the keeper, Kusal Mendis and lobs back near his gloves but he fails to pick up.
Quicker, short and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto keeps it out to the leg side. THAT WILL BE STUMPS ON DAY 4!
A full toss, on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto clips it to mid on.
Flighted, full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim uses his feet and drives it to sweeper covers for a run.
Floated, full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim pushes it to the left of the bowler.
Short and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto clips it through square leg for a single.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto knocks it back to the bowler.
Flatter, full and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto drills it to long off for one.
EDGED AND FOUR! Tossed up, full and on off, turns away. Najmul Hossain Shanto strides out to play but gets an outside edge that just flies past first slip and to the third man fence for a boundary.
Slows it up, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto blocks it out.
FOUR! Uppish but in the gap! Tossed up, full and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto carves it away aerially but safely through point for a boundary.
Flighted, full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim paddles it to fine leg for a single.
Floated, short and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim moves back and cuts it to point.
FOUR! Nice shot! Pitches it up, on middle, angling in, Najmul Hossain Shanto with just the flick of wrists, whips it through mid-wicket for a boundary. Two more overs to go for Day 4!
Full again but way down the leg side, Najmul Hossain Shanto fails to get any bat on that. Kusal Mendis called into action again behind the stumps.
Full and on middle, shaping in, Mushfiqur Rahim works it wide of mid on for a run.
Pitched up and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it to short covers.
Good length and on middle, angling down the leg side, Mushfiqur Rahim misses his flick. Kusal Mendis dives to his left to make a good one-handed stop.
Fuller and around off, Najmul Hossain Shanto steers it through point for a single.
Another short delivery, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim punches it to cover-point.
Shortish and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim cuts it to point.
Quicker, full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim steers it to point.
Flighted, full and on off, turns away, Mushfiqur Rahim leaves it alone.
Flatter, full and on leg, Mushfiqur Rahim clips it towards short fine.
Floated, full and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto pushes it through covers for a single.
Nicely bowled! Asitha Fernando bowls a cracking yorker, on middle, swinging in sharply, Mushfiqur Rahim just about manages to dig it out.
Hits the length hard, on middle, nips back in, Mushfiqur Rahim stays back and blocks it otu.
Back of a length and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim lets it go.
Goes fuller and angling down the leg side, Mushfiqur Rahim misses his flick and ges hit on the pads.
Short of a length and outside off, Najmul Hossain Shanto cuts it to deep point for a single.
Good length and just outside off, Najmul Hossain Shanto leaves it alone.
Slows it up, full and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim knocks it down the pitch.
Looped up, full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it to extra covers.
Short and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto punches it through covers for a run.
Flighted, full and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim sweeps it to deep square leg for a single.
Floated, full and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it out.

FOUR! Breaks the shackles! Tossed up, full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim backs away a bit, gets underneath it and lofts it over extra covers. The ball trickles away and just beats the chasing fielder for a boundary.
Length again, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim steers it to point for one.
Hard length and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim dabs it to point.
Short of a length and just outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim lets it go to the keeper.
Pitched up and around off, shaping in, Mushfiqur Rahim leaves it alone.
Close! Back of a length and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim stays back and looks to guide it away from his body. Gets an inside edge that just goes past the stumps towards fine leg for a brace. 150 up!
Fuller and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim taps it out to short covers. This game is not moving at all, and both teams are taking a cautious approach here.

Flatter, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto goes down and swipes it away nicely wide of deep square leg. The fielder from deep mid-wicket runs to his left and slides to push it back inside. Two taken.
Loopy delivery, full and on off, turns in, Najmul Hossain Shanto fends it on the back foot.
Flighted, full and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto strides out and blocks it out.
Short again and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto defends it on the back foot.
Floated, short and on off, turns in, Najmul Hossain Shanto stays back and pats it back to the bowler.
Tossed up, full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim backs away and drives it to sweeper covers for a single.
Goes back to his fuller length but down the leg side, Najmul Hossain Shanto fails to glance it away.
Short of a length and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim punches it through covers fo a single.
Pulls his length back, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim pats it to short covers.
Pitched up and on off, shaping in again, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it firmly down the pitch. Milan Rathnayake gets down quickly on his follow-through and makes a good stop.
Full again and on middle, shaping in, Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it out nicley.
Fuller and on middle, angling in, Mushfiqur Rahim drills it wide of mid on for a couple of runs.
Slows it up, full and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto defends it on the front foot.
Looped up, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto fends it back to the bowler.
Goes short and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim stays back and flicks it through mid-wicket for another run.
Flighted, full and on middle, turns in, Najmul Hossain Shanto goes down and sweeps it to deep square leg for a run.
Floated, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto blocks it out.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim uses his feet to go inside out and drives it through cover-point for a single. BANGLADESH LEADS BY 150 NOW!
Another fuller one, on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto knocks it to mid on.

FOUR BYES! Poor delivery! Milan Rathnayake tries to attack the stumps but errs in his line and serves this way down the leg side. Najmul Hossain Shanto misses his flick and the keeper also has no chance of stopping that as it races away to the fine leg fence for a boundary.
On a length and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto guides it towards point.
Pitched up and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto steps across and blocks it to short covers.
Full again and on middle, angling in, Najmul Hossain Shanto tucks it wide of mid on.
Fuller and around off, Najmul Hossain Shanto drives it to short covers.
TURN AND BOUNCE! Slower through the air, full and on middle, grips and turns away sharply with extra bounce. Mushfiqur Rahim strides out to defend but gets beaten on the outside edge.
Flatter, short and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim moves back and pats it down the pitch.
Goes short and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto nudges it through mid-wicket for another run.
Flighted, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto tucks it to short mid-wicket.

Risky run! Tossed up, full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim pushes it towards extra covers and sets off for the run. The fielder quickly picks up and has a shy at the bowler's end but misses. Hands on head for the Lankan players as a direct hit would have got him.
Floated, full and on middle and leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto drills it to long on for a single.
Touch fuller, on middle, shaping in, Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it out solidly.
Back of a length and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim pats it to short covers.
Pitched up but way down the leg side, Mushfiqur Rahim misses his flick.
FOUR! Streaky! Good-length delivery, on the fifth stump line, holds its line. Mushfiqur Rahim plays with a straight bat, gets an outside edge along the ground to the third man fene for a boundary.

Almost two in two! Milan Rathnayake changes his angle and comes 'over the wicket. He nails the yorker, on middle, swinging in sharply. Mushfiqur Rahim just about gets his bat in time to get an inside egde onto his pads.

OUT! LBW! Milan Rathnayake strikes! Sri Lanka finally, finally gets the breakthrough as the 68-run stand has been broken now. Rathnayake was bowling everything outside off in the last over, and he does the same here too, but this time gets it to nip back in sharply. It keeps a bit low too. Shadman Islam is not expecting that and gets stuck on the crease, trying to keep it out. The ball sneaks past the inside edge and wraps him on the pads right in front of the stumps. There is a huge appeal for LBW, and up goes the finger. Islam does not even bother to reveiw it and walks back for an excellent 76 off 126. Bangladesh three down now!
Shadman Islam lbw M Rathnayake 76 (126b 7x4 0x6)
Flatter, full and on off, Shadman Islam drills it to long off for one.
Gives this one some more air, full and on middle and off, Shadman Islam taps it towards short covers.
Slows it up, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto backs away a bit and eases it to long off for another run.
Flighted, full and on leg, Shadman Islam clips it towards square leg for a run.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Shadman Islam prods forward and blocks it out.
Floated, short and on leg, turns away, Najmul Hossain Shanto flicks it off the back foot through mid-wicket for a single.

Play and a miss! Hits the length hard and in that channel outside off, holds its line, Shadman Islam looks to play at it but gets beaten on the outside edge. However, the ball goes on the bounce to the keeper.
Back of a length and on the sixth stump line, Shadman Islam stays back and stabs it towards covers.
Pitched up and on off, angling in, Shadman Islam drives it towards mid off.
Goes full and well outside off again, not threatening at all, Shadman Islam makes another easy leave.
Good length and outside off, Shadman Islam leaves it alone.
Fuller one and around off, Shadman Islam drills it towards covers and denies the run.
Slows it up, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto knocks it down the pitch.
Shortish and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto steers it towards point.
Flighted, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto defends it on the front foot.
Goes short and on middle and leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto keeps it out towards square leg.
FOUR! A little bit of intent now! Tossed up, full and on middle, turns away, Najmul Hossain Shanto goes down on one knee and nails the reverse sweep through point for a boundary.
Floated, full and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto turns it to the leg side.
On a nagging length and around off. Islam hops and blocks to cover.
Fuller ball, outside off, Islam shoulders arms to it.
Too full and on middle, Islam flicks it to mid-wicket.
On a good length, nipping on leg. Islam jabs it to mid-wicket.
This is full and around off, Islam defends well.
Milan Rathnayake pushes it full and around off, Islam blocks it out.
Flat and across the batter, outside off, Islam cuts it to point for one.
Tossed up on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto flicks it to square leg for one.
Darts it on the pads once again, Najmul Hossain Shanto nudges it to mid-wicket.
Very full and on middle, played back to the bowler.
Flighted on the pads. Islam sweeps along the ground to square leg for one.
Bowls it full and on leg, Islam uses his feet and plays it back to PJ.
A dot to end the over as Najmul Hossain Shanto punches it to cover.
On a length and outside off, punched to cover.
Very full and around off, Najmul Hossain Shanto tries to drive but splices it to mid-wicket.
Keeps it full and close to the off pole. Najmul Hossain Shanto nicely defends it.
Goes full and around off. Najmul Hossain Shanto blocks.
Milan Rathnayake serves it full and on middle, Islam nudges it to square leg for a single.
Too full and on middle and leg. Najmul Hossain Shanto defends it well.
Flat and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto tucks with soft hands in front of leg slip.
Tossed up on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto nudges it to square leg.
Flighted full and across the eye sight of Najmul Hossain Shanto who prods and blocks.
Tossed up on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto tucks it to mid-wicket.
Flat and outside off, Islam cuts it to deep point for a single.
Flighted full on middle, Islam bunts it to mid-wicket and keeps the strike.
Tossed up on off, this is punched to point.
Flat and sticks a bit into the surface, on middle, this is nudged to mid-wicket for one.
Floated on off. Najmul Hossain Shanto watchfully blocks it out.
Goes very full and on middle, Islam nudges it to mid-wicket for a single.
Tossed up, around off, Islam punches it to point.
Outside off, Shadman Islam works it past point for a single.

FOUR! Shadman Islam dismisses all the thoughts with a fine shot! Too full and on middle, Islam plays a straight drive down to long on for a boundary. That also brings up the 50-RUN STAND between these two batters.
Islam just struggling! Asitha Fernando is sensing a wicket here. Good length delivery on off. Islam tries to fend it away but inside edges it onto the pads. It rolls just wide of the leg pole.
Shapes in a length ball, outside off, hangs low and takes the inside edge of Islam and ricochets onto the pads.
Bowls it on a length and outside off, left alone.
Bowls it full and around off, Islam pushes with soft hands to silly mid off.
Flat and outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto looks to punch as he walks across but inside edges it onto the pads.
Goes wide of the crease and bowls it full and on off, blocked out.
Slightly short and outside off, Islam cuts it to deep point for a single.
Flights it well outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto drops it to cover for a sharp single.
Tossed up, around off. Najmul Hossain Shanto covers his stumps and defends.
Prabath Jayasuriya lands it full and on off. Najmul Hossain Shanto presses forward and blocks.
Well outside off, Islam shoulders arms to it.
Too full and around off. Islam defends across on the deck.
Gives more flight and lands a full toss on off, tucked to mid-wicket.
Flights a bit and bowls it on off. Islam pushes it to mid off.
Angles it full and on the pads. Najmul Hossain Shanto whips it to mid-wicket for one.
Flighted outside off, Islam drives it to covers and rotates the strike.
A lot of turn! Fuller and outside off, spins in. Islam plays with the angle to mid-wicket for a single.
Pushes it full and around off, Islam leans and dead bats it.
Tosses it up, outside off, drilled to long on for one more.
Flighted full on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto leans and keeps it out.
Length ball on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto solidly defends it out.
Prabath Jayasuriya serves it full and spinning on off. Najmul Hossain Shanto hangs back and turns it to short leg.
A single to end the over as Najmul Hossain Shanto works it to long off.
Too full and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto prods and blocks to point.
An arm ball with the slingy action, full and on off. Najmul Hossain Shanto splices his shot on the off side.
Slows it up and bowls it full on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto blocks.
100 up for the visitors. Fuller and around off, this is pushed to long off for a single.
DDS serves it on a length and outside off. Islam knocks it to the right of cover.
Fuller and stays low after landing outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto blocks.
This is full and outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto gets outside the line to defend but misses and gets hit on the pads.
Tossed up on middle, blocked out.
THREE RUNS! Nice shot! Pitched up, outside off. Islam drives it firmly to mid off. The fielder gives chase and slides in the deep to save a run.
Fuller ball, outside off. Islam blocks it out.
Serves it full and outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto introduces the sweep shot but top edges it to the vacant square leg region for one.
Looped up full and outside off, driven to cover.
Flat and outside off, Islam slaps it to cover.
Tossed up on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto nudges it to mid-wicket for a single.
Drifts his length a bit fuller and bowls outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto looks to sweep but misses.
Very full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto solidly blocks.
A low full toss angling on middle, this is flicked to mid-wicket for a single.
Very full and outside off, this is played back to the bowler.
Bowls it outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto watchfully blocks it out.
Too full and outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto presses forward to defend.
Flighted outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto gets across the line and defends.
Floated well outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto takes a big stride forward and defend.
Lands it outside off and makes it to turn in. Najmul Hossain Shanto plays back to PJ.
Quicker, fuller and around off, Islam leans and blocks it out.
Flat and around off, Islam punches it to point.
Too full and floated on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto sweeps it to square leg for a single.
Flat and outside off, this is punched to cover.
Flights a bit and gives a lot of width. Najmul Hossain Shanto tries to drive but misses.
Tharindu Rathnayake bowls it full and on middle, Islam turns it to mid-wicket for a single.
Very full and around off, Najmul Hossain Shanto leans and blocks.
Fuller ball outside off, this is punched to mid off.
Flighted wide of off. Islam taps it late past the first slip fielder for a run.
Too full and around off, Najmul Hossain Shanto drops it to point, Islam calls for a quick single and makes it.
Flat and turning in from outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto defends but misses and gets hit on the pads.
Fuller and outside off, this is pushed to point for a single.

FOUR! One handed shot! Flighted full and around off. Najmul Hossain Shanto lofts it over to mid off and it rolls to the fence. Releases a bit of pressure off Najmul Hossain Shanto with these two shots.
Tossed up on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets behind the line and blocks.
FOUR! Najmul Hossain Shanto takes charge. Looped up outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto skips down and drags his shot off the inner half of the bat to long on for four.
Gives width outside off, Islam cuts it to deep point for a single.
Pushes it full and around off, Najmul Hossain Shanto strokes it to cover for a single.
Too full and around off, Najmul Hossain Shanto leans and pushes it to mid off.
Tossed up on middle, Islam turns it to mid-wicket.
Flat and around off, turns in. Najmul Hossain Shanto plays with the angle to mid-wicket for one.
Prabath Jayasuriya slows it up and bowls it full and outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto looks to push it as he walks across but misses.
Tossed up on middle, this is played back to the bowler.
Tossed up around of, Islam gets behind the line and across to tap it to point for a quick single.
Floats it full on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto pushes it to long on for a single.
Bowls it full and outside off, spins away. Islam offers no shot.
Darts it on the pads. Najmul Hossain Shanto flicks it to deep square leg for a single.
This is full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto prods and solidly blocks.
Well outside off, Najmul Hossain Shanto leaves it alone.
Well bowled! Floats it full and around off, turns in. Najmul Hossain Shanto looks to defend but gets beaten on the inside edge.

Flighted outside off, spins away. Islam cuts it to point for a single. That's fifty for Shadman Islam His sixth in Test cricket. He has batted really well so far and should anchor all the way through.

CLOSE! Tossed up full and outside off, spins in. Najmul Hossain Shanto leans to defend but leaves a gap for the ball to travel. The keeper picks up near the chest and appeals but it is turned down quickly.
Tossed up on middle and off. Najmul Hossain Shanto sweeps it behind square leg for a couple of runs. Bangladesh already showing some threat.
Floated full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto blocks.
Tossed up, outside off. Islam knocks it through covers for a single.
FOUR! HIT AWAY! Fractionally short and around off. Islam clears his front leg and whips it to deep mid-wicket for a boundary.
Tossed up outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto drives it to mid off for a single.
Angling on the pads. Najmul Hossain Shanto clips it to mid-wicket for a single. THAT WILL BE TEA!
Drifts in a full ball on middle and off. Najmul Hossain Shanto solidly keeps it out.
Bowls it full and outside off, spins away. Najmul Hossain Shanto gets across and defends.
Tossed up full and around off. Najmul Hossain Shanto blocks it out.
Shadman Islam uses his feet and drives this full ball to cover for one.
Floated full and outside off. Islam lets it go.
Tossed up, around off, Islam knocks it to mid off and retains the strike.
This is full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto drills it to mid on where the fielder dives to his right and stops. A single.
Pushes it full and drifting on the pads. Islam turns it to mid-wicket for a single.
Tossed up on middle and leg, Islam nudges it to mid-wicket.
DDS gets close to the off pole, fuller length and it is defended out.
An arm ball, full and outside off, Islam presses forward and blocks it out.

OUT! GONE! A wicket against the run of play! Tharindu Rathnayake bowls it in the channel around off, tossed up and Mominul Haque opts to sweep but gets a top edge, it hits his helmet and lobs to point where Lahiru Udara takes a dolly. Bangladesh are 60/2, leading by 70 runs!
Mominul Haque c L Udara b T Rathnayake 14 (40b 0x4 1x6)
Flat and skidding outside off. Mominul Haque goes back and pushes it to point.
Flatter and just outside off. Islam punches it to cover for a single.
Bowls into the surface and outside off. Islam punches it to cover.
Tossed up around off, Islam picks the length and turns it on the leg side.
Flighted on middle and leg. Islam pushes it well but to mid on.
A single to end the over as Shadman Islam plays it to long off.
Tossed up angling on middle, Islam hangs behind the line and blocks.
Gives width outside off. Mominul Haque plays it to cover for a single.
Too full and around off, Mominul Haque punches it to cover.
Flighted outside off, Mominul Haque drives it to deep cover for a couple of runs.
Goes full and around off, Islam nudges it to mid-wicket for a single.
Floats it full and around off, spins away. Mominul Haque looks to defend but misses.
Keeps it full and targets the off pole. Mominul Haque gets behind the line and blocks.
Flatter and around off, Mominul Haque leans and defends.
Tossed up on off, blocked out.
Bowls it well outside off. Islam strokes it to deep point for a single.
Quick run! Too full and on leg, Mominul Haque drills it to mid on for a single.
Slows it up and bowls it full and on off. Islam defends close to the pads.
Goes full and outside off, this is punched to cover.
FOUR! Welcome boundary! 50 up for Bangladesh and they lead by 62 now. Shorter and outside off, Islam slaps it through covers and it rolls to the fence.
Flat and outside off, Mominul Haque taps it in front of point for a single.
Tossed up, outside off, Mominul Haque drives it to point.
Fuller delivery on middle, Islam turns it to mid-wicket for a single.
This is full and around off, Mominul Haque leans and blocks it out.
Flighted fuller and on off, Islam knocks it to cover for one.
Flat and outside off, turns away. Islam is again drawn to cut but misses.
Fuller ball around off, pushed to cover.
Outside off and it turns away. Islam leaves it alone.
Slightly short and outside off. Islam gets low on the back foot to cut but misses.
Flighted a bit more on the fuller side. Mominul Haque leans and blocks.
Flighted on off, Mominul Haque drops it to cover.
Full and outside off, Mominul Haque pushes it to point.
Floats a bit and shapes around off, turns away. Mominul Haque looks to defend across but is well beaten.
Flighted full and on leg. Islam fends it to square leg for a single.
Dhananjaya de Silva starts with a fuller delivery around off, blocked out.
On a length and well outside off. Mominul Haque offers no shot.
Wide outside off, Mominul Haque leaves it.
Pushes it full and close to the off pole. Mominul Haque leans and solidly blocks.
Outside off again, Mominul Haque has nothing to do with it.
Bowls it on a length and outside off. Mominul Haque shoulders arms.
Bowls it full and around off, Mominul Haque drops it to cover.
Nicely floated on the fuller side. Islam presses in front to defend.
Flat and outside off, Mominul Haque punches it to cover for a single.
SIX! Mominul Haque goes big! Floats it very full and around off. Mominul Haque heaves it over mid-wicket and it goes the distance.
Tad short and outside off, Islam cuts it to point for a single.
Shapes in a full ball on middle, this is swept to fine leg for a single.
Floated full on off, Mominul Haque prods and blocks.
Milan Rathnayake gives width outside off. Islam slaps it straight to point.
Pitched up, outside off. Islam pushes it straight to mid off.
Length ball, around off, nips in late. Islam solidly defends it out.
Angles in a full ball, around off. Islam drags his shot to mid-wicket.
On a length and outside off, Islam punches it to cover.
FOUR! STREAKY! Good length delivery, outside off, Islam has a poke at it but gets an outside edge past first slip and wide of gully for a boundary.
Tossed up on off, turns away. Islam drops it to point for a single to end the over.
Slightly short and outside off, Mominul Haque cuts it to point for a single.
Flatter and around off, Mominul Haque hangs back and defends it out.
On off, fuller and Mominul Haque knocks it to cover.
Tossed up around off, Mominul Haque rocks back and blocks.
Fuller ball, outside off, Islam drives it to cover for a single.
Milan Rathnayake bowls it outside off. Mominul Haque leaves it alone.
Too full and outside off. Mominul Haque nicely drives it to cover.
Touch fuller and around off, Mominul Haque drops it to cover.
On a good length ball, outside off. Islam punches it to cover for a single.
A good length ball, outside off. Islam cuts it straight to point.
Milan Rathnayake bowls it full and outside off. Islam leaves it alone.
CLOSE! Flatter and around off, skids off the surface. Mominul Haque goes back to defend but gets beaten.
An arm ball, full and on off, Mominul Haque defends close to his pads.
Keeps it full and serves it outside off. Mominul Haque leans and defends.
Floated full and around off, Mominul Haque defends it out.
Tossed up on middle, Mominul Haque blocks it out.
THREE RUNS! Too full from Tharindu Rathnayake on middle, Islam flicks it to deep mid-wicket for three runs.
Serves it full and outside off. Mominul Haque leaves it alone.

OUT! GONE! Sri Lanka have the first one. Anamul Haque will be disappointed. Prabath Jayasuriya drops it short and well outside off, could be easily left but Anamul Haque chases and the extra bounce takes the edge to the keeper.
Anamul Haque c K Mendis b P Jayasuriya 4 (20b 0x4 0x6)
Fuller ball, outside off, Islam plays it to point for one more.
Too full and slower in the air on leg, Anamul Haque tickles it to square leg for one.
Flatter and around off. Anamul Haque goes back and knocks it to cover.
Tossed up on middle, Anamul Haque turns it to mid-wicket.
Drags the length back and bowls it on off. Islam covers his stumps and lets it go.
FOUR! FINE SHOT! Shadman Islam looks in good rhythm! Short of a length and on middle, Islam pulls it to deep mid-wicket for a boundary.
This is full and outside off, Islam drives it to cover.
Well outside off. Shadman Islam leaves it alone.
FOUR! Brave shot! Drops it slightly short and outside off. Islam hops and upper cuts it over the slip cordon and it rolls to the third man fence.
Touch fuller and on middle, Anamul Haque nudges it to deep square leg for a single.
Bowls it full and on middle and leg, Islam turns it with soft hands to mid-wicket.
Floated full on middle, Islam blocks on the leg side.
A single as Anamul Haque drives it to covers for a single.
Drifts this one on the pads. Anamul Haque nudges it on the leg side.
Tossed up on middle, Anamul Haque uses his feet to keep it out.
Tad short and outside off, this is cut to point for a single.
Touch fuller and on top of off. Anamul Haque taps it to cover.
Good length delivery on middle, Anamul Haque solidly blocks it out.
Too full and on middle, Anamul Haque drills it to mid on.
This is too full and on middle, Islam turns it to square leg for one.

Leg bye! Bowls it full and swinging back onto the pads. Anamul Haque misses his flick and gets hit on the pads. Once again, an appeal for LBW but it was drifting down leg. Dhananjaya de Silva is a busy man right now and so is the umpire.
A length ball, outside off. Islam cuts it to deep point for a single.

A huge LBW appeal turned down. Prabath Jayasuriya is confident as ever but Dhananjaya de Silva does not trust his player. Flat and comes with the arm, lands on middle and hits Anamul Haque on the pads. A huge appeal but turned down. Maybe, just going down. The replay shows it was umpire's call on wickets hitting.
Tossed up around off, Islam drops it to point and calls for a quick single.
Fuller ball around off, this is played back to the bowler.
Flatter and around off, bit of bounce. Islam hangs back and blocks.
Too full and outside off, Islam pushes it to cover.
Flighted and drifted on middle, Anamul Haque turns it to mid-wicket for one. He is off the mark.
Angles across a full ball, outside off. Islam shoulders arms to it.
Bowls it on the pads, nudged to mid-wicket.
Serves it full and swinging down leg, Islam looks to flick it away but seems to miss. Sri Lanka appeal but it is turned down. It brushed the pads on its way to the keeper.
A good length ball, tight onto the stumps. Islam stays back and defends it.
FOUR! Well played! Pitches it up with a bit of swing but the length allows Islam to crunch it through covers for a boundary.
Drops it on a length and around off, Islam stays inside the line and defends well.
Flighted full and around off, Anamul Haque knocks it to cover.
Tossed up on middle and turns in. Islam bunts it to square leg for a single.
Very full and outside off, Islam plays it to cover.
Flights a bit and bowls it on off. Islam prsses forward and blocks.
Too full and close to the off pole, this is tucked to mid-wicket.
Tossed up on middle, Islam leans and nudges it to mid-wicket.
Good length ball, outside off, Anamul Haque knocks it to cover.

Short of a length and close to the off pole, nips away a touch. Anamul Haque Anamul Haque takes a step down and across to push it but misses. Dhananjaya de Silva thinks for a review but there was a big gap.
Short in length and on off, Anamul Haque drops it to point.
This one lands on the fuller side and swings away. Anamul Haque is drawn forward to drive but misses.
On a length and around off, Anamul Haque punches it to cover.
Bangladesh are underway! A length ball on the pads. Islam flicks it to deep square leg for a single.

OUT! BOWLED! Five-fer for Nayeem Hasan! All the Bangladeshi players come around to congratulate him. Asitha Fernando shapes for the reverse hit and Hasan flights this fuller delivery on off, turns in and Asitha Fernando misses. It crashes the stumps.
Asitha Fernando b N Hasan 4 (8b 1x4 0x6)
Tossed up on off, Asitha Fernando leans across and defends.

Hasan Mahmud keeps it short and directs it onto the batter. Jayasuriya looks to pull but misses and gets hit on the helmet. A concussion protocol will follow but Jayasuriya has already given a thumsup.
Drops it short and on leg. Jayasuriya sits under it.
FOUR! Sri Lanka trail by 10 runs. Solid shot! Too full and around off, Jayasuriya punches it hard down to mid off and it rolls to the fence.

That's brilliant work by Rana! Shorter and on middle, Jayasuriya top edges his pull shot to fine leg. Nahid Rana runs across to his right, tumbles a bit but gets a big hand on it to keep it away from  the ropes.
Too full and on middle, this is flicked to mid-wicket.
On a good length and outside off. Jayasuriya solidly blocks it out.
Tossed up on off, spins in. Asitha Fernando gets inside the line and blocks.
Serves it full and outside off. Asitha Fernando gets low and hits hard to long off. Denies the run.
Tossed up on off, Asitha Fernando defends under his eyes.
FOUR! Sri Lanka trail under 20. Flighted outside off. Asitha Fernando skips down and smashes it over long off for a boundary.
Flat and wide of off, spins in, Asitha Fernando leans and blocks.
Bowls it full and around off, Asitha Fernando defends on the deck.
On a length and on middle, Jayasuriya defends.
Drops it short and shaping on leg. Jayasuriya looks to pull but bottom edges it to the keeper who stops it on a bounce low on the ground.
A length ball, outside off, Prabath Jayasuriya knocks it to cover.

This one comes back in by a long way! Short of a length and on off, zips in sharply. Prabath Jayasuriya is squared up in half and is beaten on the inside edge. Bangladesh think there is an edge and take it upstairs. UltraEdge shows a spike but off the thigh pad. Bangladesh have lost all the reviews.
FOUR! Bangs it short and tries to surprise the batter. Prabath Jayasuriya quickly gets into the shape to pull and hits it to fine leg for four.
On a length and on off, Prabath Jayasuriya gets behind the line and blocks.

OUT! BOWLED! Nayeem Hasan strikes again! The pitch has started to deteriorate a bit! Flatter and comes with an angle, it lands and straightens up to push Tharindu Rathnayake on the back foot to flick it away but he misses and it hits the stumps. Top stuff from Hasan.
Tharindu Rathnayake b N Hasan 0 (7b 0x4 0x6)
An arm ball, full and on middle, Tharindu Rathnayake prods to defend but an inside edge saves him. That was plumb had he not got any blade on it.
Flatter and just outside off. Tharindu Rathnayake shapes for a big reverse hit but misses. An appeal follows but that was outside the line.
Flighted very full and on off, Tharindu Rathnayake pushes it to cover.
Too full and on middle, Prabath Jayasuriya drills it to long on for a single.

OUT! FAINT EDGE! Kamindu Mendis goes! Two wickets in two overs! Nicely tosses it up around off, with a bit of flight. Kamindu Mendis leans to defend but gets an outside edge off the shoulder of the bat and lands in the mitts of Litton Das.
Kamindu Mendis c L Das b N Hasan 87 (148b 8x4 1x6)
Length ball, around off, Tharindu Rathnayake defends. A wicket-maiden over by Hasan Mahmud.
Bangs it short and around off, Tharindu Rathnayake shapes for the pull but lets it go eventually.
On a length and wide of off. Tharindu Rathnayake blocks it to cover.

OUT! DRAGGED ON! This was coming! Milan Rathnayake was struggling against Mahmud! The bowler has done it with consistency! Bowls it on a good length and drags it just outside off. Milan Rathnayake tries to fend it away but gets an inside edge and it hits the stumps on a bounce. Good start to the session by Bangladesh.
Milan Rathnayake b H Mahmud 39 (83b 3x4 1x6)
Shapes in a length ball, around off. Milan Rathnayake hangs back to block, inner halves it onto the deck.
Serves it short and over the off pole. Milan Rathnayake stands tall and lets it go.
Too full and around off. Mendis defends on the front foot.
Floats it on around off. Mendis gets inside the line and blocks.
Flighted full and drifts on off. Milan Rathnayake plays it to short third man for a quick single.
Serves it full and on middle, Milan Rathnayake solidly blocks.
A huge appeal for LBW but turned down! Bangladesh think it is going down. Tossed up on middle and comes with the arm. Milan Rathnayake is beaten as he looks to defend. Yes, that was missing leg.
Tossed up around off, Milan Rathnayake goes back and punches off the inner half onto the deck.
Drags his length back and bowls on off, Mendis defends on the deck.
FOUR! Clean as he has been so far this innings. Pitched up, outside off. Mendis leans and crunches it through covers for a boundary.
Goes a bit full and around off, Mendis punches it to cover.
Consistent line and length so far from Hasan! On a nagging length and on off, played back to the bowler.
At 133 clicks! On a length and around off, Mendis steers it with soft hands to cover.
Bowls a good length delivery on middle, Mendis half presses forward and blocks it.
Dragged length and around middle, Kamindu Mendis goes back and punches it through covers for one. LUNCH ON DAY 4!
Much full and around off, Milan Rathnayake drives it to long off for one.
Bowls it fuller now and around off, Milan Rathnayake defends it.
Touch short and on the pads, Kamindu Mendis gets behind the line and nudges it towards fine leg for a single.
Nagging length and outside off, Kamindu Mendis moves across and defends it.
Begins with a short ball, around off, Milan Rathnayake goes back and pushes it through covers for one.
A yorker, around off, Kamindu Mendis pushes it back to the bowler off the bottom part of the bat.
A bit flatter, full and outside off, Kamindu Mendis pats it down to backward point.
Touch short and outside off, Milan Rathnayake punches it through covers, where the extra cover fielder cuts it off but the batter takes a single.
Full and around off, Milan Rathnayake drives it back to the bowler off the front foot.
Tossed it up, around middle, Milan Rathnayake comes forward and defends it right under his eyes.
Nagging length and around off, Milan Rathnayake drops it down to cover.
Nagging length and a bit outside off, Kamindu Mendis again skips down the track and drives it back to the bowler, who stops it on his follow-through to his left.
Fuller and around off, Kamindu Mendis uses his feet and defends it back to the bowler.
Short and outside off, Milan Rathnayake pats it down towards cover point and takes a single.
Dragged length and around off, Milan Rathnayake stays on the back foot and blocks it off.
Tossed it up, around middle, Milan Rathnayake defends it off the back foot.
Full and around off, Milan Rathnayake uses his feet and flicks it to mid on.

FOUR! PUNISHED! Touch short and around off, Kamindu Mendis goes back and pulls it down towards deep mid-wicket. Nahid Rana runs in to his left from long on and puts in a dive to cut it off but fails to save there. Mendis gets another boundary after a confirmation from the third umpire, where he checks the replays.
Tossed it up, around off, Kamindu Mendis blocks it off from the back foot.
A bit short and around off, Milan Rathnayake punches it through covers for one.
Tossed it up, around off, Milan Rathnayake defends it.
Fuller and around off, Kamindu Mendis skips down the track and drives it to the left of long off for a single.
Tossed it up, around off, Kamindu Mendis uses his feet and defends it.
Drops it a bit short and outside off, Milan Rathnayake waits for it and cuts it very late. He finds the gap towards third man for a couple of runs.
Hardly driven! Full and outside off, Milan Rathnayake shuffles across and drives it but straight to cover.
Tossed it up, around off, Milan Rathnayake defends it into the off side.

FOUR! DRAGGED! Quicker, and flatter, outside off, tries to keep it away from the batter's arc. However, Milan Rathnayake uses his feet and manages to drag it as he lofts it off the cue end of the bat down the ground for a boundary this time. Also, 450 is up for Sri Lanka.
SIX! TAKE DOWN! Floated it up, outside off, Milan Rathnayake uses his feet, gets to the pitch of the ball, and smokes it down the ground for a biggie.
Tossed it up, around off, Milan Rathnayake blocks it off towards cover.
Flights it up, around off, Kamindu Mendis comes forward and drops it down towards cover point.
Fuller and around off, Kamindu Mendis uses his feet and blocks it off into the off side.
Floated it up, around off, Milan Rathnayake stays leg side of the ball and drives it to long off for one.
Full and around off, Milan Rathnayake drills it back to the bowler again, who stops it on his follow-through.
Tossed it up, around off, Milan Rathnayake drives it back to the bowler.
Touch short, slower, Milan Rathnayake blocks it off.
Full and outside off, Kamindu Mendis goes on his knees and sweeps it but straight to short leg.
Nagging length and around off, Kamindu Mendis uses his feet, and plays out with his body to block the ball.
Short and outside off, Milan Rathnayake presses back and cuts it hard towards backward point. Mominul Haque chases it down and cuts it off to save one run for his side. Three runs taken.
Tossed it up and around off, Kamindu Mendis uses his feet and pushes it towards cover for one.

A big appeal for caught behind, but the umpire shakes his head again! This time, however, Bangladesh have gone upstairs! Much shorter and outside off, Kamindu Mendis shuffles across, and the bowler follows him. He withdraws his shot as he shoulders his arms. The ball passes near his gloves, and the third umpire is called in. UltraEdge shows nothing on it, and the on-field call stays. Bangladesh lose another review.

WOW! On the shorter side and wide outside off, turns back in sharply, probably from the crack and gets a variable bounce as well. Kamindu Mendis goes across and doesn't offer any shot, as he plays it with his pads and gets hit on the front one. There is an appeal for LBW but is turned down!
Nagging length, around off, Milan Rathnayake pats it down towards backward point off the back foot.
Lands it full and around off, much slower, Milan Rathnayake comes forward and drives it to cover.
Darts in quicker, full and around off, Milan Rathnayake defends it.
Dragged length and outside off, Milan Rathnayake jumps onto that one and cuts it but straight to extra cover.
Yorker, around middle, Milan Rathnayake digs it out back to the bowler.
Tossed it up, around off, Milan Rathnayake uses his feet and drives it to cover.
Full and around off, Kamindu Mendis uses his feet and drives it hard but straight to Mushfiqur Rahim at covers.
Full and around leg, Kamindu Mendis moves across and misses his tickle shot. An appeal for the caught behind but is turned down!
Short and around middle, Milan Rathnayake pushes it to mid off and takes a single. Also, 50 is up for this partnership.

In the air... but falls safely! Floated it up and outside off, Milan Rathnayake skips down the wicket and looks for a big lofted shot but mistimes it off the outer half of the bat. The ball flies up over the backward point fielder and they take two runs.
Tossed it up, around off, Milan Rathnayake steps out and defends it towards cover.
Full and outside off, Kamindu Mendis uses his feet and slices it through covers for one.
Full and on middle, Milan Rathnayake defends it.
A bit quicker and on a dragged length, outside off, Kamindu Mendis cuts it through covers for one.
A full toss again, around off, Kamindu Mendis again uses his feet and drives it hard but straight back to the bowler, who stops it on his follow-through.
Tossed it up, around off, Kamindu Mendis steps out and pushes it towards cover.
Fails to find the gap! Short and outside off, Kamindu Mendis cuts it hard off the back foot but straight to backward point.

A low full toss, around off, Kamindu Mendis uses his feet and drills it back to the bowler, who collects it on his follow-through and throws it back on the striker's end but Mendis goes back in his crease in time.
Full and around off, Milan Rathnayake blocks it down.
BEATEN! On the shorter side, around off, turns back in, Milan Rathnayake goes for the cut shot from the back foot but plays very late and gets beaten on the inside edge of the bat.
Touch short and around off, Kamindu Mendis goes back, uses the depth of the crease and turns it towards square leg for a single.
Much fuller and outside off, Milan Rathnayake drives it through covers for one.
Tossed it up, around off, Milan Rathnayake uses his feet and defends it.
Slower, on a tempting length, around off, Milan Rathnayake goes back and drops it down towards mid-wicket.
Nagging length and outside off, Kamindu Mendis uses his feet and plays it out into the off side.
Dragged length and around middle, Milan Rathnayake goes back and looks to defend it but gets an inside edge towards fine leg for a single.
Flighted it up, around off, Milan Rathnayake blocks it off from the front foot.
Full and around middle, Milan Rathnayake comes forward and defends it.
Nagging length and around middle, Milan Rathnayake hangs back and defends it right under his eyes.
A full toss, around middle, Kamindu Mendis uses his feet and flicks it to wide mid on for a single.
Flatter, full around off, Milan Rathnayake defends it.
Tossed it up, on the pads, Milan Rathnayake comes forward and tucks it to square leg.
Touch short and around off, Milan Rathnayake chops it out to the slip fielder.
Nagging length and around middle, Milan Rathnayake blocks it off.
Full and around off, Milan Rathnayake defends it.

FOUR! LUCKY ESCAPE! Tossed it up, around off, Milan Rathnayake comes forward to defend it with soft hands but gets an outside edge that falls down ahead of the slip fielder, Shadman Islam. The ball goes through his legs for a boundary, even though the fine leg fielder tries to chase it down but fails to get to it.
Full and around middle, Kamindu Mendis blocks it off.
Nagging length and around middle, Kamindu Mendis uses his feet and looks to defend it but misses and gets hit on the front pad. There is an appeal for LBW but is turned down by the umpire.
Floated it up, on middle, Kamindu Mendis flicks it to mid on.

Taijul Islam moves to his left there and extends both his arms upwards to take it back, but the ball goes through his hands towards mid off. How costly will it prove for them?

FIFTY FOR KAMINDU! Starts off from over the wicket and bowls it on the fuller length and on the pads, Kamindu Mendis flicks it in the big gap towards mid-wicket. Takes three runs, and the deep square leg fielder cuts it off with a dive in the deep, and Mendis completes his milestone. A fantastic knock from a class player and his team will hope that he plays till the end of this inning and takes them to a lead.

But the ball catches only the inside edge of the bat and goes to the left of the keeper, where Litton Das moves and dives there fully and takes this sharp catch.
