OUT! TAKEN! Dinesh Chandimal falls to the trap! Bangladesh finally have the breakthrough. Nicely bowled from Nayeem Hasan as he serves it on the rough, full and on leg, this one doesn't turn much. Dinesh Chandimal presses forward to flick but edges it to leg slip where Shadman Islam takes the catch. The third umpire has a look at it. The replay shows Islam took it cleanly, low on the ground.

Gets it lobbed straight back to the bowler for a simple catch. A much needed breakthrough for Bangladesh. Can they build up on this?

Short, on off, Pathum Nissanka taps it to covers.
Full, outside off, Lahiru Udara pushes it to covers for one.
Beauty! This one lands on off and turns away, Lahiru Udara looks to block it but gets beaten.
Taijul Islam comes into the attack and bowls it on off, Pathum Nissanka pushes it to covers for one.
Length, angling in, Lahiru Udara blocks it to mid off.
FOUR! Perfectly timed shot! Fuller one, on off, Lahiru Udara leans on and times it elegantly through mid off for a boundary.
Length, down leg, Pathum Nissanka looks to block it but the ball brushes his pads and rolls fine. They cross.
FOUR! Shot! Short and on middle, Pathum Nissanka swivels and pulls it magnificently through mid-wicket for a boundary.
On a length, down leg, Pathum Nissanka looks to block it but wears it on his pads.
Good length, on middle, Pathum Nissanka hops a bit and fends it back to the bowler.
On a length, on off, Lahiru Udara pushes it to short covers.
Length, shaping in, Lahiru Udara offers solid block.
Fuller one, on off, Lahiru Udara pushes it to mid off.
FOUR! Nicely played! Fuller one, outside off, Lahiru Udara picks it well and slashes it over the leaping fielder at backward point for a boundary.
On a length, angling in, Lahiru Udara blocks it back.
FOUR! Well played! Fuller one, on middle, Lahiru Udara picks it well and clips it in the gap through mid-wicket for a good looking boundary.
On a length, just outside off, Pathum Nissanka shoulders arms at it.
Short and wide, Pathum Nissanka leaves again.
Length, shaping away, outside off. Pathum Nissanka leaves it alone. It's a no ball for overstepping.
Another one outside off, Pathum Nissanka looks to slap it but misses.
FOUR! Well played! Short and wide, Pathum Nissanka hangs back and slaps it powerfully through point for a boundary.
Back of a length, down leg, Pathum Nissanka looks to flick it but wears it on his pads.
Short and wide, Pathum Nissanka leaves it alone.
Three runs! Relief for Nissanka as he finally gets off the mark. Short and wide, Pathum Nissanka slaps it through point. The fielder has a long chase as the batters collect three runs.
That's good start from the Bangladeshi seamers! Short and just outside off, Pathum Nissanka looks to slap it but gets beaten.
Length, down leg, shaping away. Pathum Nissanka looks to flick it but wears it on his pads. An appeal but turned down.
Fuller, outside off, Pathum Nissanka taps it to the cover fielder who makes a good stop diving to his right.
Oh, that's a beauty! Length, outside off and it comes in. Pathum Nissanka looks to block it but gets beaten all ends up.
Fuller one, just outside off, Pathum Nissanka pushes it to short covers.
Back of a length, on middle, Lahiru Udara fends it to short covers.
Play and a miss! Length, outside off and it shapes away late. Lahiru Udara has a lazy waft at it but gets beaten.
Another one way outside off, Lahiru Udara leaves it alone again.
Short and way too wide, Lahiru Udara leaves it alone.
FOUR! Lahiru Udara gets off the mark in a streaky manner. Length, outside off, shaping away. Lahiru Udara looks to punch it but gets a thick edge as the ball races through short third for a boundary.
Back of a length, on off, Lahiru Udara blocks it to point.
On a length, outside off, Lahiru Udara leaves it alone. It's a no ball for overstepping.
A stifled appeal but turned down! Back of a length, on leg, Pathum Nissanka looks to block it but hits his pads. An appeal but turned down. Perhaps the height.
On a length, and it comes back in cramping Pathum Nissanka for room. He hops a bit and fends it to short mid-wicket.
Fuller again, just outside off, Pathum Nissanka eases it to short covers.
Goes fuller now, on middle, Pathum Nissanka covers his line and blocks it back.
Back of a length, on off, Pathum Nissanka fends it to short covers.
Some movement straightaway. On a length, on off, with a hint of movement. Pathum Nissanka pushes it to short covers.

OUT! CAUGHT BEHIND! Back of a length, down leg, shaping away further. Nahid Rana looks to flick it but misses. Gets his glove on it as the ball carries behind the sticks. Kusal Mendis dives to his left and takes a good catch. Bangladesh have been bowled out for 495 runs!
Nahid Rana c K Mendis b A Fernando 0 (8b 0x4 0x6)
Slower one, just outside off, Hasan Mahmud pushes it to point for one.
On a length, on off, Hasan Mahmud leaves.
FOUR BYES! Bonus runs for Bangladesh! Wayward bouncer, down leg, Hasan Mahmud leaves. The keeper just manages to get a glove on it but the ball still races away to the fine leg.
Full, on leg, Hasan Mahmud clips it over mid-wicket for just a single. He denies for the second run and he wants to keep the strike.
Touch fuller, outside off, shaping away. Hasan Mahmud looks to drive it but misses.
Back of a length, outside off, slower too. Hasan Mahmud leaves it alone.
Goes full, down the leg side, Hasan Mahmud flicks it to the left of the keeper.
Good length again, on middle, Hasan Mahmud offers solid defence.
On a length, on leg, Hasan Mahmud flicks it to the fielder at short fine.
Oh! On a length, on middle, Nahid Rana looks to block it but gets an inside edge onto his pads.
Back of a length, on leg, Nahid Rana looks to block it but gets a blow on his body.
Goes fuller, on leg, Hasan Mahmud clips it to mid-wicket for one. The Bangladeshi batters will take everything that comes their way.
On a length, outside off, Hasan Mahmud looks to block it but misses.
FOUR! Useful runs for Bangladesh! A yorker, outside off, Hasan Mahmud looks to block it but gets a bottom edge. The ball bumps over the keeper's head and races away for a boundary.
Asitha Fernando starts with a length ball, on leg, shaping away further. Hasan Mahmud stands tall and blocks it.
Beaten! Length in the channel, and this one shapes away late. Nahid Rana wafts at it and is beaten all ends up.
Short and wide, Nahid Rana leaves the harmless delivery.
On a length, outside off, shaping away. Nahid Rana has a lazy waft at it but gets beaten.
Too full, angling into the batter, Nahid Rana defends it solidly back to the bowler.
Oh! Full and hung outside off. More curve away from the batter, and it goes past the outside edge of Nahid Rana's flailing blade.

OUT! CAUGHT BEHIND! Milan Rathnayake gets his third wicket! Good length, angling in at off stump, which means Nayeem Hasan has to play at this. Milan Rathnayake gets it to jag away off the seam and kisses the outside edge. The ball carries behind, and Kusal Mendis, behind the sticks, goes low and completes a smart catch to his right.
Nayeem Hasan c K Mendis b M Rathnayake 11 (30b 1x4 0x6)
Short, on leg, Nayeem Hasan hops a bit and fends it to mid-wicket for a quick single.
Down the leg side again, Nayeem Hasan tries to flick it but misses again. Five dots now.
On a length, down leg, Nayeem Hasan looks to tickle it fine but misses.
Fuller one this time, outside off, Nayeem Hasan eases it to the cover fielder.
A wayward bouncer, on leg, Nayeem Hasan ducks under it.
On a length, just outside off, angling in. Nayeem Hasan blocks it to short covers.
Too full, outside off, Hasan Mahmud pushes it to the cover fielder.
Past the edge! On a length, outside off, Hasan Mahmud looks to block it but gets beaten.

OUT! TIMBER! Milan Rathnayake gets his second! The previous delivery moved in and this one moved away. A good setup from Milan Rathnayake. On a length, on middle stump line, and it moves away a shade. Taijul Islam looks to block it but gets beaten on the outside edge as the ball clatters into the off pole. Taijul Islam walks back into the shed.
Taijul Islam b M Rathnayake 6 (7b 1x4 0x6)
On a length, shaping in, outside off. Taijul Islam wafts at it and is beaten all ends up.

FOUR! Streaky, but Taijul Islam will take it! On a length, outside off, Taijul Islam looks to cut it but gets an outside edge. The ball flies quickly to the lone slip fielder, Kamindu Mendis, who is standing a bit wide. He is late to react to his right and the ball clips his fingertips and races away to the fence. A difficult chance, but it will go down as a dropped catch.
Fuller one, on off, angling in. Taijul Islam pushes it back to the bowler.
Fuller, just outside leg, Nayeem Hasan blocks it to the on side.
Wide! Down the leg side, Nayeem Hasan leaves. The umpire stretches his arms to signal for a WIDE.
Tosses it up, on off, Taijul Islam pushes it through extra covers for one.
Shorter, down the leg side, turning in. Nayeem Hasan slogs it through backward square leg for one.
Flatter, on middle and leg, Taijul Islam turns it to square leg for one. He gets off the mark.
Loopy, on middle, Taijul Islam leans on and blocks it back.
Goes full, on leg, Nayeem Hasan sweeps it fine for one.

OUT! TIMBER! Milan Rathnayake gets his first wicket! On a length, landed around off and this jagged back in. Jaker Ali leans on and looks to block it, but misses. Gets beaten on the inside edge as the ball goes through the gap between the bat and the pad to rattle the stumps. Jaker Ali falls for 8 (16). Bangladesh are now 474/7.
Jaker Ali b M Rathnayake 8 (16b 1x4 0x6)
Drags his length back, just outside off. Jaker Ali defends this to the cover region.
On a nagging length, outside off. Shaping away from the batter. Jaker Ali leaves it alone.
Nails the yorker, swinging back onto the stumps. Jaker Ali gets his bat down in time and digs it towards the leg side. He loses his balance in the process.
On a good length, angling into the batter. Jaker Ali looks to defend but gets an inside edge onto his pad.

FOUR! Jaker Ali welcomes Milan Rathnayake with a four! Milan Rathnayake serves this one on the full length, on the off stump. Jaker Ali gets on the front foot and drives it through the mid off region for a boundary.
Fuller, on the outside leg. Nayeem Hasan tucks it to short fine leg and looks for a quick single, but the fielder does well to stop the ball and prevent the single.
Tossed up, down the leg side, Nayeem Hasan pads it away.
Shortish, outside leg. Nayeem Hasan rocks back and tucks it to short fine leg.
Slower through the air, down leg, Nayeem Hasan lets it go.
Fuller, on the pads. Nayeem Hasan gets on the front foot and defends it.
Flatter, on leg, Jaker Ali sweeps it to deep backward square leg for one.
Ends the over with a fuller ball, on the off stump. Just a hint of an away movement from the batter, and Nayeem Hasan presses forward and blocks it to cover.
Short of a length, on the fifth stump line. Nayeem Hasan steers it to backward point.
Back of a length, angling into the batter. Jaker Ali tucks it to square leg for a single.
Goes fuller, wide outside off. Nayeem Hasan sees the width and throws his hands at it to slash it towards deep backward point for one.
Bangs this one on a short of a length, angling down the leg side. Nayeem Hasan leaves it alone to the keeper.
Starts on a short of a length, angling into the batter. Nayeem Hasan clips it to mid-wicket.
Ends the over with a fuller ball, on the stumps. Nayeem Hasan drives it to mid off for a quick single.
Short, on off, Nayeem Hasan defends it to short mid-wicket.
Fuller, on the pads. Jaker Ali sits down on his knee and sweeps it to fine leg for one.
Flatter, on leg, Jaker Ali blocks it to the on side.
Tossed up and fuller, outside leg stump. Nayeem Hasan gets down on one knee and sweeps it to fine leg for one.
Jaker Ali gets off the mark! Fuller one, down leg, Jaker Ali sweeps it fine for one.
On a full length, outside off stump. Nayeem Hasan shoulders arms at it.
Short of a length, just outside off. Nayeem Hasan defends it back to the bowler.
Nails the yorker, on the off stump. Nayeem Hasan gets down his bat in time and digs it to the off side.
On a length, outside off. Nayeem Hasan guides it towards backward point and takes off for a single, but is sent back by his partner in time.
Short of a length, shaping away from the batter, outside off. Nayeem Hasan throws his hands at it but gets beaten on the outside edge.

FOUR! Streaky, but they all count! Asitha Fernando bangs this one on a short length, angling into the batter. Nayeem Hasan looks to pull that one but gets a top edge of the bat and it goes towards fine leg for a four.
Slower and fuller, just around the leg stump. Jaker Ali blocks it back to the bowler.
Full, on off, Nayeem Hasan sweeps it through square leg for one.

OUT! TAKEN! The defensive plan has paid off for Sri Lanka! Tharindu Rathnayake stays over the wicket and floats it up just outside the line of the leg stump. Litton Das brings out the reverse and tries to drag it away. The ball drops on him and kicks up a bit to catch the strap of the glove near the wrist. It goes onto hit him on the left shoulder and it pops up for the keeper, Kusal Mendis, to complete an easy catch. Litton goes for 90 (123). Bangladesh are now 458/6.
Litton Das (wk) c K Mendis b T Rathnayake 90 (123b 11x4 1x6)
Keeps the line outside the leg stump, Litton Das lunges to defend.
Shortish, outside the leg stump. Litton Das looks to flick it but misses it to the keeper.
Floated up from over the wicket, on the pads, Litton tucks it to short mid-wicket.
On a back of a length, outside off. Jaker Ali hops back and defends it back to the bowler.
Back of a length, on the off stump. Jaker Ali gets on top of the bounce and blocks it back.
Good length, just around that fifth stump line. Jaker Ali looks to play it initially and changes his mind at the last second, and leaves it alone.
On a full length, outside off. Jaker Ali presses forward and blocks it on the off side.

OUT! LBW! A loud shout and the finger is raised. This nips back in a bit, on a good length, on middle and leg, Rahim is not quite fully forward for the flick. The bat hits his front pad and the ball sneaks past the inside edge to hit him on the front pad. Mushfiqur Rahim goes for the review. There is no bat involved. The Ball Tracking comes up as umpire's call with the ball clipping the leg stump. Finally, some joy for Sri Lanka. End of a marathon knock from Mushfiqur. The 149-run stand is broken.
Mushfiqur Rahim lbw A Fernando 163 (350b 9x4 0x6)
Starts with a good length ball, on the fifth stump line. Mushfiqur Rahim shoulders arms at it.
Fuller and slower, on the pads. Litton Das works it to square leg.
Short and around leg, Litton misses out on the flick and wears it on the thigh pad.
Fuller, on the leg stump. Litton Das helps it to short fine leg.
Wide! Once again short, down the leg side. Litton Das looks to pad it away but misses it to the keeper. WIDED!
FOUR! Smartly done! Floated up, full and on the pads, Litton paddles it fine of the man at short fine leg for a boundary.
This turns a bit, on the pads, Litton Das smothers the spin watchfully.
Wide! Down leg, on a nagging length. Litton Das leaves it alone. Given wide for deliberately bowling a negative line.
Tossed up but down leg, Litton Das lets it be.

A loud shout for caught behind but the umpire is not interested. Asitha Fernando went up in an appeal straight away but found no support from the keeper. Dhananjaya de Silva also seems to have heard something and he goes for the review. In the channel on off, a hint of seam movement away from the batter, Mushfiqur Rahim defends a bit away from his body and the ball whistles past the outside edge. The UltraEdge shows no spike and the on-field decision will stand. Sri Lanka have no reviews left.
On a short length, outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim gets on the backfoot and defends it to the off side.
BEATEN! Asitha Fernando bowls it on a full length, shaping away, just from that fifth stump line. Mushfiqur Rahim goes for an expansive drive but gets beaten on the outside edge.
On a length, just outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim presses forward to defend but gets an inside edge onto his pads.
On a good length, wide outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim shoulders arms at it.
At 128 kph, on a back of a good length, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim steers it with an open bat face but the gully fielder does well to make the stop with a dive to his right.
Fuller and slower, on the middle and leg. Mushfiqur Rahim uses his feet and drives it to long off for one.
Another flighted delivery, on middle, MR defends it off the front foot.
Fuller, on the pads. Litton Das gets down on one knee and sweeps it to fine leg for a single.
Floated up, on middle, Das blocks it out on the leg side.
Fuller, on the pads. Litton Das pads it away.

FOUR! Smart batting! Prabath Jayasuriya comes from over the wicket to target the rough outside the line of the leg stump. Prabath drops it short and the slowness of the surface allows Litton to back away and thrash it through covers for a boundary.
Goes fuller again, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim leans on and blocks it to short covers.

Mushfiqur Rahim finds the gap perfectly! Asitha Fernando bowls this on the back of a length, wide outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim hops back and punches it to covers. The man in the deep runs to his right to keep it to two.
On a good length, around off stump. A hint of an away movement and Mushfiqur Rahim guides it to gully.
Bowls this one fuller, shaping away, well wide outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim shoulders arms and lets it go to the keeper.
Goes shorter, wide outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim chops it to the point fielder.
Starts from over the wicket, on a full length, outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim shoulders arms at it.
Ends the over with a fuller ball, outside off. Litton Das gets on the front foot and blocks it to the left of the bowler.

FOUR! Clever, very clever! Short and flat, outside off, Litton Das gets close to the line of the ball while staying deep in the crease. Steers it with an open bat face through backward point for a boundary.
Tossed up, outside off. Litton Das rocks back and cuts it to the backward point fielder.
On middle, defended with a straight bat by Litton.
Loopy and fuller, on the stumps. Litton Das prods forward and blocks it back to the bowler.
Coming on with the arm, this keeps a bit low, on a nagging length, Das pushes it to cover.
Goes shorter, outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim leaves it alone to the keeper.
Angling into the pads, on a length, Litton Das gets on the front foot and worls it to the right of mid on for a single.
Back of a length, on the off stump. Litton Das defends it back to the bowler.
On a hard length, on off, Litton Das eases it to mid on off the back foot.
Good fielding there from the point fielder! Bowls this on the back of a length, outside off. Litton Das rocks back and punches it to point where the fielder dives to his right and stops it.
Milan Rathnayake goes full, on off, played with a straight bat to mid off.
Tossed up and outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim prods forward and blocks it to the off side.
This is short, on off, Litton Das goes deep in the crease and jabs it to deep mid-wicket for one more.

FOUR! Litton Das goes aerial this time! Prabath Jayasuriya bowls it fuller and outside off. Litton Das picks it early and gets down on one knee and sweeps it over mid-wicket for a boundary. The fiedler in the deep runs to his left but couldn't able to stop the ball.
Around off, Litton is solid in defence.
Loopy and fuller, outside off. Litton Das lunges forward and blocks it back to the bowler.
FOUR! Nicely done! Prabath Jayasuriya spears it in, flat and short, around off, Litton Das presses on the back foot quickly and cuts it late to the left of backward point for a boundary.
On a good length, on the middle and leg. Mushfiqur Rahim flicks it straight to short mid-wicket.
So nearly sneaked through! Honing in on the off stump line, on a nagging length, Mushfiqur Rahim is a bit tentative in defence. Gets an inside edge and the ball dribbles past his legs.
On a good length, just around the fifth stump line. A bit of a shape away from the batter. Mushfiqur Rahim shoulders arms at it.
Pitched up but on the pads, Litton Das works it away to deep mid-wicket for one.
Pitches it on the back of a length, outside off. Litton Das defends this one right under his eyes.
Serves it on a length, on off, Litton Das gets forward to defend.
Slower and floated, outside off stump. Mushfiqur Rahim pushes it to short cover.
Short again, a bit quicker, on off, Das stays leg side of the ball and cuts it to the left of deep cover for a brace.
Shorter and outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim gets on the backfoot and cuts it to point for one.
Looped up, on middle and leg, Mushfiqur Rahim whips this full ball to mid on.
A bit shortish, angling into the batter. Litton Das rocks back and taps it to mid-wicket for a single.
Darted in, on off, on a length, Litton Das blocks it out with a straight bat.
Goes fuller this time, on the off stump. Mushfiqur Rahim presses forward and defends it to point.
On the pads again, on the fuller side, Litton Das wrists it wide of mid-wicket and crosses over.
On the back of a length, angling on to the leg stump. Litton Das tucks it away towards deep backward square leg, where the fielder keeps it to two.
Lands it on a length, on off, Litton Das knocks it with a straight bat to mid off.

A huge shout of LBW, but the umpire says NO! Dhananjaya de Silva has taken the review. Milan Rathnayake bowls it on a length, angling into the batter. Mushfiqur Rahim gets beaten on the inside edge and wears it on the back pad. Milan Rathnayake looks confident, and they are going upstairs! The UltraEdge shows no bat involved, onto the Ball Tracking, and it shows the umpire's call as it was clipping the top of the leg stump. So the on-field decision of NOT OUT stays intact. Also, the ball rolled towards deep third man and the batters ran three as leg byes!
Too full, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim pushes it to mid off.
Ends the over with a fuller ball, on the off stump. Litton Das lunges forward and defends it to the off side.
FOUR! Well played! Tossed up, Litton Das goes down and fetches it from outside off. Makes a good connection and pumps it over the leaping mid on fielder for a boundary.
Slower and fuller, on the off stump. Litton Das blocks it back to the bowler.
Too full, on off, Litton Das digs it back to the bowler.
Tossed up and fuller, around off. Litton Das presses forward and defends it with the soft hands to off side.
Turn and bounce, outside off, Litton Das gets in two minds. Decides to block it but gets beaten on the outside edge.
Ends the over with a back of a length delivery, on the middle and off. Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it towards mid off.
Good length, on leg, pushing away further. Mushfiqur Rahim looks to flick it, but the ball hits him on the pads. A stifled appeal, but the ball was clearly missing leg stump.
Bowls fuller, just around the off stump line. Mushfiqur Rahim prods forward and blocks it to the off side.
Back of a length, way outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim offers no stroke.
On a good length, on the middle and leg. Mushfiqur Rahim defends this one solidly back to the bowler.
On a length, shaping away, Mushfiqur Rahim leaves it alone.
Shortish, on the off stump. Litton Das rocks back and pulls it to square leg, where the fielder fumbles a bit, but does well in the end to stop the ball. No run.
Short, turning in, Mushfiqur Rahim rocks back and tucks it to mid-wicket for one.
Fuller, outside off. Turning into the batter. Mushfiqur Rahim hops back and blocks it to the onside.
Loopy, on middle, Litton Das whips it over mid-wicket for just a single.
Fuller and slower, on the stumps. Mushfiqur Rahim gets forward and flicks it to mid-wicket for one.
Full, on middle, Litton Das sweeps it through square leg for one.

An appeal of LBW, but the umpire is not interested! Milan Rathnayake bowls it fuller, angling on the pads. Mushfiqur Rahim looks to flick it but fails to get any connection and wears it on the pad. Seemed to be going down leg and the replays showed that even the impact was outside leg.
Five dots in a trot. Length, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim hops a bit and blocks it back.
Pitches it on the back of a length, angling down the leg side. Mushfiqur Rahim flicks it but misses it to the keeper.
Length again, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim leaves it alone.
Bowls it on a good length, on the middle and leg. Mushfiqur Rahim flicks it to mid-wicket.
Good length, just outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim taps it to short covers.
Loopy, on middle and off. Litton Das hops back and helps it to short fine leg.
Goes fuller again, on middle, Litton Das flicks it to short mid-wicket.
Fuller, just around off. Turning into the batter. Mushfiqur Rahim gets on the back foot and cuts it to backward point for a single.
Tossed up, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it to short mid-wicket.
Tossed up and fuller, on the stumps. Litton Das flicks this one to mid-wicket for a single.
Brings up the reverse, does Mushfiqur Rahim.  Full, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim reverse sweeps it towards deep backward point for one.
Back of a length, on off. Litton Das defends it right under his eyes to mid off.
Good length, angling in, Litton Das blocks it to the left of the bowler.
Bowls it on a good length, on the middle and leg. Just a hint of away movement and Litton Das, who looks to defend but gets an outer half of the blade to gully.
Goes fuller, on middle and leg, Litton Das nudges it through mid-wicket for a brace.
Lands it down leg, Mushfiqur Rahim looks to flick it but the ball brushes his pads and rolls fine. They collect a leg bye.
Milan Rathnayake starts with a slower one, just outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim leaves it alone.
Slower and fuller, just around off. Turning into the batter and Litton Das nudges it to square leg.
A low full toss, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it through covers for just a single.
Tossed up and fuller, on off. Mushfiqur Rahim uses his feet but hits it straight to mid-wicket.
Quicker one, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim leans on and blocks it back.
Fuller, sliding on the pads. Litton Das tucks it to backward square leg for one.
Flatter, on middle and leg, Litton Das flicks it to short mid-wicket.
Short length, wide outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim shoulders arms and leaves it to the keeper.
Shaping away again, outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim shoulders arms.
Full length, shaping away, well wide outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim lets it be.
Short and wide again, Mushfiqur Rahim leaves again.
Bowls it on a good length, outside off. Just a bit of shape away from the batter. Mushfiqur Rahim leaves it alone.
Back of a length, just outside off, Litton Das hangs back and punches it to extra cover for one.
Lands it on leg, Mushfiqur Rahim flicks it but finds the fielder at square leg.
Flatter, down leg, Mushfiqur Rahim looks to slog it but misses.
Slower through the air, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim digs it to mid on.
FIFTY up for Litton Das! Too full, on middle again, Litton Das nudges it through mid-wicket for one. A wonderful knock so far from Litton Das!
Fuller one, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim works it through mid-wicket for one.
Turn and bounce, down leg, Mushfiqur Rahim pads it away.
Dot to end! A bouncer from Asitha Fernando, Litton Das ducks underneath it.
Fuller again, just outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim taps it to covers for one.
Goes fuller, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim pushes it to short covers.
On a length, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim leaves it alone.
Play and a miss! Back of length outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim has a fiddle and cannot adjust with the bounce.
Touch fuller, just outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it to short covers.
FOUR! Shot! Loopy, just outside off, Litton Das leans onto it and creams it magnificently through covers for a good-looking boundary. Litton Das moves to 49 now and Bangladesh's 400 comes up!
Quicker one, on off, Litton Das flicks it to the square leg fielder.
Short, on off, Litton Das blocks it back.
Fuller one, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim taps it to long on for one.

FOUR! 150 up for Mushfiqur Rahim! Tharindu Rathnayake errs his line down the leg side, Mushfiqur Rahim swivels and helps it through fine leg for a boundary. He gets a well-deserved appreciation for a classy innings!
Short, on middle and leg, Litton Das tucks it to mid-wicket for one.
Width on offer, Mushfiqur Rahim reads it well and leaves it alone.
Good length again, just outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim takes a step forward and taps it to the point fielder.
On a length, angling in, Mushfiqur Rahim stays in his crease and blocks it solidly towards short covers.
Short and wide, some away movement off the deck. Mushfiqur Rahim leaves the harmless delivery.
FOUR! Great timing on this! A juicy half volley, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim leans on and cracks a drive through the cover region. That was a delight to watch.
On a length, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim pushes it to covers.
Loopy, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim shuffles across and digs it to extra cover for one.
Goes fuller this time, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim pushes it to covers.
Shorter, just outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim rocks back and punches it to the cover fielder.
Quicker again, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim covers his line and blocks it back.
Flatter, shorter, and on leg. Litton Das tucks it to mid-wicket for one more.
Starts with a slower one, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim pushes it through mid off for one.
Tossed up and fuller, on the stumps. Litton Das blocks it on the front foot. That will be the Lunch Break on Day 2! Bangladesh are in a solid position after the first session.
Flat and short, around leg, Mushfiqur Rahim whips it through mid-wicket for a single.
Fuller, just around middle and leg. Mushfiqur Rahim tucks it down to leg slip.
Sprayed down leg, on a nagging length, Rahim lets it pass. The umpire Alex Wharf has a word with Tharindu Rathnayake, probably asking the debutant to avoid running on the danger area.
Fuller, on the leg stump. Mushfiqur Rahim offers no shot on that one, and the ball deflects from his pad to leg slip.
Sharp turn but down leg with a leg slip in place. Mushfiqur Rahim lets it be.
Fuller and coming in with the arm. Litton Das hops back and blocks it to cover.
Floated up from around the wicket, outside off, on a length, Litton Das drags the sweep but the shot hits the man at short leg on the shin.
Floated, on the off stump. Litton Das presses forward and defends it to the off side.
Flat and short, on off, Litton rocks back to keep it out.
Tossed up and fuller, on the outside off. Litton Das prods forward and blocks it to mid off.
Serves it full, at the stumps, Litton Das gets right behind it.
Fuller, outside leg stump line. Mushfiqur Rahim lets it go to the keeper.
This grips a bit with a bit of extra bounce, on middle, on a nagging length, Litton Das fends it with soft hands behind towards short fine leg for a run.
Fuller, around middle and off. Mushfiqur Rahim flicks this one to square leg for one.
Full and on off, played to mid on.
On middle, pushed back to the bowler.
From over the wicket, lands it on a length, around the pads, Mushfiqur Rahim gets forward and clips it through square leg for a single.
Tossed up, full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim steps out and knocks it to long off for one.
Angled in, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim is solid in defence.
Fuller, outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it back to the bowler on the front foot.
Fuller and quicker, on off, driven firmly to cover.
Tossed up and fuller, on the stumps. Mushfiqur Rahim prods forward and looks to defend, but gets an inner half of the bat to the leg side.
Full, on middle and leg, Mushfiqur Rahim nudges it to mid-wicket.
Fuller, on the off stump. Litton Das gets on the back foot and defends it.
Pushed through, on a nagging length, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim turns it away to backward square leg.
Tossed up and fuller, on the leg stump. Mushfiqur Rahim flicks it to long on for one.
Slow and full, on middle, Litton Das plays it with the turn to deep mid-wicket for another easy single.
Fuller, on the leg stump. Mushfiqur Rahim uses his feet and drives it to long on for a single.
Sliding onto the pads, Litton works this full ball to deep square leg for another single.
Tossed up, fuller and outside off. Litton Das tucks it to mid-wicket for one.
Keeps it full, on off, driven past cover for a single by Mushfiqur.

FOUR! This time Mushfiqur Rahim charges down the track! Prabath Jayasuriya bowls it fuller, on the middle and off, turning away from the batter. Mushfiqur Rahim uses his feet and comes down to the track to hit it aerially down the ground for a four.
Switches to over the wicket and lands it full, around the pads, Mushfiqur Rahim jabs it to mid-wicket.
Fuller, arm ball on the off stump. Litton Das taps it to deep mid-wicket for a single.

SIX! Excellent use of the feet! Tossed up from around the wicket by Prabath Jayasuriya, on off, on a length, Litton Das puts the dancing shoes on and swings through the line. Tonks it back over the bowler's head for a biggie.
Fuller, wide outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim punches it to cover from the backfoot.
Floated up, on middle and leg, Mushfiqur Rahim steps out and works it to mid-wicket.
Fuller, on the stumps. Mushfiqur Rahim charges down the track and looks to flick to mid-wicket but gets beaten on the inside edge onto the pads.
At the stumps, on a length, Mushfiqur Rahim clips it to short mid-wicket.

Good running between the wickets! Shortish and wide outside off. Litton Das dabs it to the left of the first slip. The ball rolls to the third man region, where Angelo Mathews runs from deep backward point and keeps it to three.
At 82 kph, full and around off, Litton Das blocks it out solidly.
Tossed up and fuller, on the pads. Mushfiqur Rahim tucks it to square leg.
Darted into the pads, on the shorter side, nudged to square leg by Rahim.
Fuller, outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim gets on the backfoot and defends it to cover.
Loopy delivery, on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler.
Tossed up, on the off stump. Mushfiqur Rahim hops back and guides it to the backward point fielder.
Full and around leg, Litton Das works it off the pads to deep mid-wicket for one.
Full and on middle, Litton wrists it in front of square on the leg side for one.
Full and around leg, Litton Das turns it to square leg.

FOUR! Edge and it runs away for a four! Runs are coming thick and fast for Bangladesh in this over. Tharindu Rathnayake floats it up, turning away from the batter. Litton Das throws his hands at it and gets an outside edge, and the ball flies to the right of the slip fielder towards third man for a boundary.
FOUR! 350 up for Bangladesh! Tharindu Rathnayake continues to give the ball air, on middle, Litton Das swipes across the line and hits it well over mid-wicket for four more.

FOUR! Litton Das gets enough elevation this time. Tharindu Rathnayake bowls it fuller, on the off stump line. Litton Das comes down the track and smashes it well over Pathum Nissanka at mid-wicket for a four.

Chance? The reaction of Tharindu Rathnayake suggests so. The replays confirm that it was indeed a DROPPED catch. Tossed up, on middle, Litton das whips it uppishly to the right of mid-wicket where it goes at a good height around the waist. Pathum Nissanka dives to his right but the ball hits him hard on the palm and drops down on the ground.
Fuller, on the stumps. Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it on the front foot.
Attacking the front pad from around the wicket, on a length, on middle, defended solidly by Rahim.

FOUR! Uh oh, Prabath Jayasuriya has an opportunity in the follow-through but is late to react. Prabath Jayasuriya bowls it fuller and tossed up, on the off stump. Mushfiqur Rahim charges down the track and hits it straight over the bowler's head. Prabath Jayasuriya, on his follow through tries to grab it with both hands up in the air, but the ball just flies over his hands for a four.
Slower and fuller, on off, Litton guides it wide of cover and crosses over.
Tossed up and fuller, on the off stump. Coming in with the arm. Litton Das plays it late and tucks it to the right of first slip.
Floated up, on middle, eased to mid on by Das.
Now back to right arm. Fuller, on the middle and leg. Mushfiqur Rahim tucks it on the backfoot towards mid-wicket.

Risky single! Fired in, very full, on middle, Litton whips it to the right of the man at mid on. Sonal Dinusha, the substitute fielder, picks it up by moving to his right and fires in a throw at the batting end. He fails to hit the target and Rahim gets in. The replays show that had the throw hit, Mushfiqur was gone.
Bowls with the left arm. Fuller and outside off. Litton Das drives that one through covers. Angelo Mathews in the deep runs to his right and does well to keep it to two.
Short and wide on off, cut away off the back foot to deep backward point for a single.
Fuller, on the stumps. Mushfiqur Rahim drives it back to the bowler. Tharindu Rathnayake dives to his right to stop that one.
This goes straight, fractionally short, around off, Mushfiqur Rahim waits back to dab it down on the off side.
Floated and fuller, outside off. Litton Das gets on the back foot and defends it to cover.
Coming in with the arm, short and around the pads, MR helps it wide of backward square leg for one.
Tossed up, on the off stump. Mushfiqur Rahim prods forward and looks to defend, but gets it off the inner half of the bat to the onside.
Slows it down, bowled at 78 kph, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim gets forward to smother the spin.
Fuller, on the off stump. Litton Das hops back and punches it to the cover region for one.
Floated up, at the stumps, blocked out off the front foot.
Tossed up, just outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim plays it late and guides it to the deep third man region. Two runs taken.
Pushed through, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim covers the off stump and makes the leave.
Slower and fuller, on the off stump line. Mushfiqur Rahim knocks it to cover.
Short and flat, on off, punched away to deep cover for another single.
Fuller, sliding down the leg side. Mushfiqur Rahim comes down the track and flicks this one to mid-wicket for one.
Tosses it up, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim lunges to defend.
Fuller, on the stumps. Litton Das blocks this one back to the bowler.
Another one that slides on with the arm, on middle and leg, Litton Das goes back to stab it down on the leg side.
Fuller and sliding on with the arm, on the middle and leg. Litton Das gets on the backfoot to flick but misses it and wears it on the front pad. An appeal of LBW, but the umpire turns it down.
At 80 kph, full and on off, pushed to cover.
Fuller and slower, outside off. Litton Das drives it to the cover fielder.
Tossed up, full and on off, knocked down to long off for a single.
Tossed up, just outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim gets on the front foot and drives it to mid off. The fielder there dives and keeps it to one.

Oh, a bit of a yes, no, in the middle, but luckily, both the Bangladesh batters are safe! Short, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim eases it to point and calls for one. Litton Das runs more than halfway but is sent back by Mushfiqur Rahim. The fielder throws the ball at the wrong end towards the keeper, and Litton Das runs back and manages to make it back.
On a good length, around that fifth stump line. Milan Rathnayake gets a bit away movement on that one. Mushfiqur Rahim shoulders arms and lets it go to the keeper.

Fuller, on middle and leg, Litton Das flicks it through square leg for one. Bangladesh batters are looking relaxed at the moment. Sri Lankan bowlers will need to change their plans as this pitch is not helping the pacers at all.
Pitches it on the full length and gets his line right, on the off stump. Litton Das gets on the front foot and defends it to mid off.
Sprays it down the leg side, Mushfiqur Rahim flicks it through square leg for one.
Floated, on the stumps. Litton Das blocks it back to the bowler.
Too full, on middle, Litton Das leans forward and blocks it back.
Slower and fuller, on the stumps. Litton Das gets forward and defends it back to the bowler.
FOUR! Too short, on middle and leg, Litton Das picks up the length early, rocks onto the back foot, and tucks it through mid-wicket. Easy pickings.
Fuller, on the off stump. Mushfiqur Rahim gets down on one knee and goes for the slog sweep to deep square leg. Single taken.
Slower through the air, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim pushes it to short covers.
On a good length, on off stump. Litton Das gets forward and pushes it to mid off.
Hard length, pushing it wider outside off. Litton Das offers no stroke.
On the full length, on the middle and leg. Litton Das pats it to the mid on fielder.
Fuller one, on middle and leg, Mushfiqur Rahim picks it well and helps it fine for one.
Bowls this one on the fuller length, outside off stump line. Mushfiqur Rahim presses forward and defends it back to the bowler.
Milan Rathnayake comes into the attack and bowls it right on the money. Fuller one, targeting the stumps, Litton Das flicks it behind square on the leg side for one.
Loopy and slower through the air, on the off stump line. Litton Das flicks it to mid-wicket for a single.
Three runs! A low full toss, Mushfiqur Rahim flicks it through mid-wicket. The fielder has a long chase to do as the batters collect three runs.
Bowls this one fuller, sliding down the leg side. Mushfiqur Rahim lets it go.
Short, on middle and leg, Mushfiqur Rahim rocks back and blocks it solidly.
Tossed up, around off stump. Mushfiqur Rahim lunges forward and blocks it back to the bowler.
Slower through the air, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim leans on and blocks it back.
On the back of a length, on the leg stump. Mushfiqur Rahim hops back and works it to mid-wicket for one.
Good length, with a hint of away movement. Mushfiqur Rahim reads it well and leaves it alone.
On the back of a length, angling into the batter. Litton Das gets on the backfoot and tucks it toward mid-wicket for a single. He gets off the mark with that single.
Goes fuller this time, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it to covers for one.
Lands this one on the good length, in the fifth stump channel. Mushfiqur Rahim shoulders arms at it.
Some movement! Back of a length, outside off, and swinging away. Mushfiqur Rahim leaves the harmless delivery.
Goes short again, on leg to cramp Litton Das. He gets behind and blocks it to cover.
Short, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim hangs back and punches it to covers for one.
Fuller, sliding on the leg stump. Mushfiqur Rahim lunges forward and looks to defend, but gets an inside edge on the pad.
Slower one this time, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim lunges and blocks it to short covers.
Tossed up, on the off stump. That one turns a bit away from the right-hander. Mushfiqur Rahim drives it to cover.
Flatter, on middle and leg, Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it to mid on.
Ends the over with a full-length ball, around the fifth stump line. Litton Das looks to drive that one but gets it off the inner half of the blade to the bowler.
Short and wide, Litton Das shoulders arms at it.
Lands it on the back of a length, on the middle, and off. Litton Das presses forward and blocks it back to the bowler.
On a length, on off, Litton Das blocks it back.
Pitches it on the good length, angling into the right-hander. Litton Das looks to flick that one but misses it and wears it on the front pad, and the ball rolls onto the leg side.

OUT! TAKEN! Asitha Fernando delivers a much-needed breakthrough for the Lankans! On a length and outside off, it sticks in the deck. Najmul Hossain Shanto looks to drive it but the ball hits the upper part of his bat. It carries towards mid off. Angelo Mathews dives forward and takes a brilliant catch. Najmul Hossain Shanto walks back after a dazzling knock. The 264-run stand is broken. Shanto falls for 148 (279) and Bangladesh are now 309/4.
Najmul Hossain Shanto (c) c A Mathews b A Fernando 148 (279b 15x4 1x6)
Fuller, just outside off. Mushfiqur Rahim hops back and looks to cut, but hits it straight to the backward point fielder.
Down the leg side, Mushfiqur Rahim leaves it alone.
Floated, just outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto gets on the backfoot and guides it to the point region for a single.
Flatter, on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets low again and helps it fine for a brace again.
Tossed up, on middle and leg. Najmul Hossain Shanto gets down on one knee and sweeps it to the left of backward square leg. Two runs taken.
Too full, on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto taps it to mid off.
Eventful over but no joy for the Lankans! Full, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim flicks it to the mid-wicket fielder.
Some movement! On a length, on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto turns it to deep backward square leg for one.
Oh! On a length, shaping away, Najmul Hossain Shanto looks to block it but gets beaten.

Given LBW but successfully overturned by Najmul Hossain Shanto! Nipping back in, on a back of a length, around leg from over the wicket, Najmul hops to deal with it but gets beaten on the inside edge. The ball catches Shanto high on the flap of the front pad. A loud shout and the finger is raised. Shanto takes the review. It came as a bit of a surprise when the finger went up. Seemed to have pitched outside leg and looked high as well. There is a spike when the ball is next to the bat and at the same time, the bat is hitting the pad but the third umpire is convinced that there is an inside edge. The on-field decision is reversed. The Ball Tracking is in and it shows that the ball had pitched outside leg, so the decision would have been overturned anyway.
At the hips, on a short of a length, Rahim flicks it through square leg for a run.
On a back of a length, going across, played on the up to deep point for a single by Shanto.
Goes fuller, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim lunges and blocks it.
Bowls it on off, Mushfiqur Rahim eases it to mid off.
Another dot! Short again, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim taps it to mid off.
Short again, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it to covers.
Short again, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim eases it back.
Short, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it to mid off.
FOUR! Lovely shot! On a length and on middle and leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto rocks onto the backfoot and flicks it elegantly over mid-wicket for a boundary.
On a length, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto punches it to the fielder at mid off.
Not where he intended. Fuller one, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim looks to drive it but miscues it to deep point for one.
Short, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim shoulders arms at it.
Errs his line down the leg side, Najmul Hossain Shanto helps it fine for one.
On a hard length, just outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim taps it to short covers for one. 250 runs partnership up between this duo now!
Just one run off the over again. Fuller, on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto lunges and blocks it solidly.
Touch fuller, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto eases it back again.
Turn and bounce, Najmul Hossain Shanto fends it back to the bowler.
Flatter, on middle and leg, Mushfiqur Rahim goes deep in his crease and turns it to mid-wicket for one.
Goes full this time, Mushfiqur Rahim lunges and defends it to point.
Short, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it to point.
Just a single off the over. No trouble for the batters, though. Good length, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto stands tall and blocks it.
Another dot. Touch fuller, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto eases it back again.
Good defence from Shanto. Length again, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto blocks it back to the bowler.
Better length, but no movement. Najmul Hossain Shanto covers his line and blocks it to short mid on.
First runs of the morning! Back of a length, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim taps it to short covers and scampers across for a single.

Asitha Fernando starts with a dot! No swing, back of a length, on off. Mushfiqur Rahim fends it to the point fielder. Sri Lankan bowlers are under some pressure! They need early breakthroughs to turn the tide in their favor.
Prabath Jayasuriya stays over the wicket and attacks the stumps, on a nagging length, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets a big stride in to block it out. Safely negotiated and that will be STUMPS on Day 1!
On off, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets to the pitch of the ball and defends.

Beaten! Half an appeal for caught behind from Prabath Jayasuriya but he gets no support from the men behind the bat. This does not turn and just goes on with the arm, on off, on a length, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets his bat out in front to block and plays for the non-existent turn. The ball whistles past the outside edge.
Drags the length back and this is around middle, Mushfiqur Rahim goes back in the crease and nudges it to square leg for a run.
Gives the ball a lot of air, very full, on middle, Rahim squeezes it out on the leg side.
Sliding on with the arm, short and on the pads, Mushfiqur Rahim misses out on the flick and wears it on the front pad.
Back to bowling it full, at the stumps, Najmul Hossain Shanto taps it back to the bowler.

Good commitment late in the day by Asitha Fernando! Short and turning in, on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim backs away and cuts it along the ground to the right of deep backward point. Fernando covers a lot of ground to his right and dives to prevent the ball from touching the fence. Saves a run for his side.
Looped up, full and on off, Shanto knocks it down the ground to long off for a single.
On middle and leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets his bat out in front of the front pad to keep it out.
Keeps it full, on off, blocked out.
Full and wide on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto strides forward and eases it to cover.

A bit of grip and turn on this one after drifting in, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim is unable to smother the spin after getting on the front foot and the ball spins to catch the shoulder of the bat. It dribbles on the off side.
Slower through the air at 81 kph, on the fuller side, Rahim drives it to cover.
Coming in with the arm with a flatter trajectory, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim stabs it down on the off side.
Shanto plays for the turn as he reaches out in front to defend this full ball, on off. Gets it off the outer half to point for a run.
Short and on off, punched back to the bowler.
Short and this skids through, outside off, Najmul Hossain Shanto makes room and cuts it to the left of deep backward point where Angelo Mathews mops it up. Two runs taken.
Slows it down, loopy delivery, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim firms the drive straight to cover.
Short and on middle, Shanto punches it to long on and crosses over.
Full and sliding on with the arm, on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto lunges to block it out. Gets an inside edge that rolls it to the left of deep fine leg for a couple.
Short and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto pushes it to cover.
Flat and short, around leg, Rahim flicks it through square leg for a single.
Short and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim waits back to defend.
Full and outside off, Najmul Hossain Shanto goes for the big booming drive but miscues it back towards the bowler.
Full and on middle, clipped to mid-wicket.
This is on a short of a good length, Najmul Hossain Shanto punches it back to Fernando.

Quick single taken and that will be CENTURY FOR RAHIM! 12th Test ton for the veteran and it has been a long time coming. Came into the series on the back of a lean patch and the relieved look on his face says it all. On a back of a length, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim drops his bat down on the ball. Gets an inside edge that goes through his legs and dribbles beside the pitch on the leg side. Rahim is unaware of where the ball is but Shanto calls him through for a single. The keeper, Kusal Mendis, has a shy at the bowling end but misses. It would not have mattered even if the throw had hit the stumps as Mushfiqur was in. The helmet is off and Rahim thanks the Almighty.
At 127 kph, on a hard length, outside off, Najmul punches it to deep point for a single.
From around the wicket, on a nagging length, outside off, Shanto lets it be.
Pushed through, on off, turned to mid-wicket by Mushfiqur Rahim.
Floated up, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto caresses it to long off and crosses over.
Full and on off, played back to Tharindu Rathnayake.
Outside off, left alone.

MISFIELD, FOUR! Tharindu Rathnayake offers flight and keeps it full, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto skips down the track and drills it along the ground to mid off. The debutant, Lahiru Udara fails to get his body behind the ball and in the end, dives ahead to make the stop. The ball bounces past him and races away for a boundary.
Fuller and on middle, Najmul pushes it back to the bowler.
Slower through the air, fuller as well, Mushfiqur Rahim blocks it solidly.
Short and on off, Rahim steers it to backward point.
Coming with the angle, full and on middle, Rahim sets up for the drive but miscues it off the inner half to mid-wicket.
Turning into the pads, Najmul Hossain Shanto works this short ball with the spin to deep square leg for another single.
Fractionally short, on off, Mushfiqur Rahim presses back to punch it past cover. Moves to 99!
On a length, on the pads, worked to mid-wicket.

FOUR! Fine shot! On a hard length, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets on top of the bounce and punches it to the right of mid off. Prabath Jayasuriya goes after it and does well to push the ball away from the fence. The boundary cushions gets pushed further away and as Prabath gets back into the field of play to release the throw, the replays show that his foot was on the line marked as the boundary and at that time, he had the ball in his hand.
Missed out! Short and wide on off, asking to be hit, Najmul Hossain Shanto throws his hands at the ball but chops it down onto the deck off an under edge.
Very full, at the toes, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets his bat down quickly and whips it through mid-wicket for two more.

Another one of those optimistic shouts for LBW but this time, Dhananjaya de Silva has taken the review! Seemed to be going down leg to the naked eye. Slanting into the left-hander from around the wicket, on a length, on middle and leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto's head falls over to the off side and he is beaten on the flick on the inside edge. There is no bat involved on UltraEdge. Ball Tracking shows that the ball is missing the leg stump. Sri Lanka lose their review. They have only 1 review left.
Full and swinging back into the pads, Najmul Hossain Shanto brings his wrists into play and works it to the left of deep square leg for a couple of runs more.
Angling away, on a short of a length, Najmul Hossain Shanto stands tall and hammers it to the left of deep point for a brace.
At 82 kph, full and on off, driven to long on for a single.
Short and on off, Rahim rocks back and punches it past cover for one.
Slower, fuller and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim keeps it out on the off side.

Another appeal for LBW and turned down, again! Sliding on with the arm, on a nagging length, on middle and leg, Mushfiqur Rahim defends outside the line. Gets beaten on the inside edge and the ball hits him on the front pad. Looked to be heading down leg and the Ball Tracking confirms it.

A loud shout for LBW but turned down! Dhananjaya de Silva has a chat with the keeper before opting against the review. Angled in from around the wicket, around off, Mushfiqur Rahim shoulders arms and pads it away. Seemed to be missing the off stump.
Tossed up, full and on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto pats it to long on and crosses over.
Not close enough to make the batter play, well outside off, an easy leave for Rahim.
Pitched up, curving away from the right-hander, Mushfiqur Rahim did think about playing it but resisted eventually to let it pass.
Tailing back in sharply, at the sticks, on the fuller side, Shanto keeps his front pad away and whips it to deep square leg for a single.
FOUR! Easy pickings! Asitha Fernando errs in line as he strays on the pads, on a length, Najmul Hossain Shanto just works the angle and helps it to the right of deep fine leg for a boundary.
Outside off, on a good length, left alone by Shanto.
Jagging back in from around the wicket, on a back of a length, on middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets right behind it.
Pushed through, full and at the stumps, flicked through square leg for one more.
At 82 kph, full and on off, Najmul lunges to block it out.
Angled into the pads, Mushfiqur clips this full ball to the left of deep square leg for another single.

FOUR! Up and over! Darted into the right-hander from around the wicket, on a length, Mushfiqur Rahim skips down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball and lofts it over mid on for a boundary. Moves to 96, does Rahim! This also brings the 250 up for Bangladesh!
Short and on off, Rahim goes back to keep it out.
Drifting in, full and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim defends it off the front foot.
Down leg, swept along the ground but straight to short fine leg.
On middle and leg, Shanto is solid in defence.
Slower through but again on the pads, Najmul Hossain Shanto pats it down the deck with a straight bat.
A bit quicker but on the pads, Shanto tucks it to mid-wicket.
Very full, on middle, squeezed out to mid-wicket.
Slow and full, on the pads, nudged down on the leg side.
Fuller and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim eases it to mid off.
Shorter and on off, Mushfiqur steers it off the back foot to backward point.
Around off, pushed to short cover.
Full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim plays it back to Prabath.

Top edge but Mushfiqur Rahim gets away with it! Nicely tossed up by Prabath Jayasuriya, full and on middle, Rahim goes for the full blooded sweep but the ball drops on him and a top edge is found. Skies it up but luckily for him, it drops in the vacant deep backward square leg region. Two runs taken.
Speared in, short and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim goes back to defend.
Short and at the hips, Mushfiqur Rahim premeditates the reverse paddle and waits for it before playing it towards deep third for one.
Slower through the air at 78 kph, on a length, on the pads, Mushfiqur Rahim steps out and nudges it to mid-wicket.
Short and on middle, pulled past the diving man at square leg for a single.
On middle, stabbed down on the leg side.
Short and around leg, Shanto turns it to mid-wicket from the crease.

Was that a chance? Nah, the noise was of the bat hitting the turf. It was still close to the off stump, though. Too full for the sweep and it goes across, Shanto goes for the sweep but the ball goes under his bat. The keeper, Kusal Mendis gets around but fails to hang on.
Goes full now, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto taps it down to long on for another single.
Drifting in, on middle and leg, kept out.
Keeps it short and there is a hint of turn, on off, Rahim plays it through covers for one more.
Short and on off, this keeps a bit low, Najmul Hossain Shanto pats it in front of mid off and steals a quick single.
On the shorter side, on middle, MR plays the lap towards short fine leg for a run.
Prabath Jayasuriya offers flight from around the wicket, on off, on a length, Rahim charges down the track to open up the off side but miscues it off the inner half towards mid-wicket.
A hint of away turn, on off, on a nagging length, Najmul blocks it out.
Beaten! Slower through the air and the length is dragged back, Najmul Hossain Shanto is early on the sweep and the ball bounces over his gloves.
On the pads, defended off the front foot.

FOUR BYES! Fired across the batter from around the wicket, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets down for the sweep but misses. The keeper, Kusal Mendis misses as well as he is standing a bit towards the leg side in anticipation of the paddle and the line of attack of the debutant. He fails to get around in time and the ball races away.
Short and on leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto waits back to block.
Full and on leg, Rahim pushes it towards long off and takes a single.
Full and on off, knocked to mid off.

HUNDRED FOR SHANTO! An ideal start to the new WTC cycle for the Bangladeshi skipper and he has made the most of the conditions. On off, on a length, Najmul reaches out in front and plays the paddle to the left of deep fine leg for a couple of runs. Najmul leaps in delight after completing the second run and almost gets hit by the throw coming in from the deep. He hops and manages to evade it as the ball goes through his legs. His teammates are all smiles on the balcony as Shanto celebrates his 6th Test ton.
On the pads, on a length, swept away to deep backward square leg for one more.
Shanto moves to 99! Slower through the air and fuller, on middle, Najmul reaches out in front and paddles it to deep fine leg for one.
Flat and short, on middle, Shanto nudges it to short mid-wicket.
Loopy delivery from around the wicket, on off, Rahim eases it past cover for a single.

The only second maiden over from Tharindu Rathnayake! Lands it outside leg, again, Najmul Hossain Shanto rocks back and tries to play it fine on the leg side, but the ball grazes his front pad and rolls towards short fine leg.
Drags the length back a bit, on the leg stump, tickled to short fine leg.
Fuller one and outside leg, Shanto mistimes the sweep shot to square leg.
Nice and full, just around off, blocked out watchfully.
Another one outside leg, Shanto sweeps it to short fine leg, and the fielder dives to his left to intercept.
Pitching outside leg, on a fuller length. Najmul Hossain Shanto misses to sweep and the ball thuds on his front pad.
Length, outside off, punched through cover for a single.

Bowls fuller and just around off, Najmul Hossain Shanto plays with a straight bat face and knocks it straight back. Milan Rathnayake falls over in an attempt to stick his left hand out to get his hand on it, but it rolls behind and crashes into the stumps at the bowler's end.
Onto the pads, on a hard length. Mushfiqur Rahim misses to tickle it and the ball grazes his thigh pad and rolls down to deep fine leg. They cross for a leg bye.
Angling across middle and on the leg stump, on a length. Najmul Hossain Shanto nudges this across to deep backward square leg for a single.
Full and straight around off, Shanto presses forward and defends it right under his eyes.
Short of a length, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim opens the bat face and runs this to deep backward point for a single.
Lands it outside leg on a length, with some spin on it. Najmul Hossain Shanto gets behind the line and blocks it off the back foot.
Pulls the length back, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto stands tall and punches it to short mid-wicket.
Fuller one, outside leg again, this time, Shanto sweeps it straight to short fine leg.

FOUR! Poor delivery, and it gets the treatment! Shanto moves on to 96 now! Pitched outside leg, on a fullish length. Najmul Hossain Shanto gets low on his knee and sweeps it to deep fine leg for a boundary.
Pushed through on a fuller length, outside leg. Najmul Hossain Shanto blocks it straight back.
Full and outside leg, flicked to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Another slower delivery, outside off, Najmul Hossain Shanto defends it out watchfully.
Pace off, at just 108 kph, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto waits for it to arrive, and drops this on the surface with soft hands.
Nagging length, outside off, worked to cover-point.

Not in control there! Full and angling in from outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto swings his bat across a bit early, looking to go over the infield, but hits it off the inside half of the bat, just over mid on for a couple of runs.
Just outside off, on a hard length, Najmul Hossain Shanto drives it solidly, but straight to silly mid off.
Back of a length, on top of off, Mushfiqur Rahim hops on the back foot and guides it to deep backward point for an easy single.
Dishes out a full delivery, around off, Mushfiqur Rahim prods forward and drives along the turf to long off for a single.
Full, on off, pushed straight to short cover.
On middle and full, flicked to deep square leg for a single. Shanto gets in his 90s now!
Too full and Mushfiqur Rahim flicks this past mid-wicket for a single. The partnership grows to 170 runs now.
Drags the length, outside off, Najmul Hossain Shanto premeditates the sweep shot, and hits it to deep fine leg for an easy single.
A low full toss, on middle, drilled down to long off for a single by Rahim.
Angling across off, on a good length. Punched away by Shanto towards extra cover.
Length ball, outside off, Rahim presses forward and works this through the gap at cover-point for a single.
Full in length, on middle and leg, Mushfiqur Rahim flicks off the inner half of the bat to mid-wicket.
Full and straight on middle, gently pushed straight back by Rahim.
Length and outside off, punched straight to cover.

Is Rahim strangled down the leg side? An appeal for caught behind and there is  a sound as well when the ball passes next to the bat. But the umpire shakes his head. Going down leg on a fullish length. Mushfiqur Rahim misses to flick and the ball passes closer to the bat and the keeper collects it behind the stumps. Dhananjaya de Silva does not opt for a review here. And a good decision as the UltraEdge shows the ball to be grazing the front pad of Rahim, on the way to the keeper.
Length, on off and middle. Worked off the back foot to short mid-wicket.

Full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim leans forward and drives it to the left of the bowler. Prabath Jayasuriya moves to the left to make the stop, but the ball evades him and runs down to long off for a single.
Flighted delivery, full and on off, Mushfiqur Rahim skips forward and drives straight to short cover.
Sliding across off, on a length. Najmul Hossain Shanto rocks back and tucks this across to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Too full, around off, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it to deep cover for an easy single.
Drops it full and on middle. Rahim carves it out back to the bowler.
Length-delivery, slightly outside off, Najmul Hossain Shanto strides forward and blocks right under his eyes.
Angled across off, on a hard length, at 130 kph, Najmul Hossain Shanto with a solid back foot block on the surface.
Outside leg, on a length at the pads. Najmul Hossain Shanto nudges this across to square leg.
On the fourth stump line, on a length. Najmul Hossain Shanto knocks it to silly mid off.
Short of a length, on middle. Najmul Hossain Shanto gets on the back foot and defends from the inner half of the bat as the ball rolls into the leg side.
Milan Rathnayake is back on. Back of a length, outside off, Mushfiqur Rahim punches this through covers for a single.
Short of a length, outside off, punched straight back to the bowler.
Nice and full, turning a bit into the batter, from off. Najmul Hossain Shanto defends off the inner half of the bat. The ball rolls to mid-wicket.
Drags the length back, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto goes deep in the crease and tucks this across to the leg side.
FOUR! Another one swept away neatly! Drops it fuller, does Prabath, spinning in a shy bit. Najmul Hossain Shanto sweeps it to the left of the diving square leg fielder for a cracking boundary.
Looped up, fuller and on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto gets a huge stride forward and taps it back to the bowler.
Just outside off, on a length, Mushfiqur Rahim cuts off the back foot to deep point for a single.

Good proactive running! Fuller ball, angling on middle and leg. Mushfiqur Rahim flicks it towards mid-wicket and straightaway calls for a run. Shanto responds well to it and rushes through to the other end. A quick single.
Short of a length, just outside off, Rahim goes on the back foot and punches it to short cover.
Fuller and around off, Rahim leans on it and taps it out to the point region. Looks for a quick single but is sent back by Shanto on a loud call.
A silly mid off also comes forward now. Asitha bowls a length ball, keeping it outside off. Najmul Hossain Shanto hangs back and cuts it to deep point for another single.
Back of a length, wide of off, Najmul Hossain Shanto stands tall and slashes it hard, but finds the fielder at extra cover.
Straight and full, on middle, at 130 kph, Najmul Hossain Shanto knocks it straight and the silly mid on fielder makes the diving stop to his right.
Flatter and quicker, on a length, just around off. Mushfiqur Rahim rocks back quickly and cuts it straight to the point fielder.

200 UP FOR BANGLADESH! Runs have come regularly for them and these two have just not allowed any Sri Lankan bowler to settle. Very full and on the stumps, swept away by Shanto to deep square leg for an easy single.
Touch fuller, drifting on the leg stump, Mushfiqur Rahim clips it off the front foot to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Shorter ball, on the stumps. Enough time for Shanto to rock back and steer it through mid-wicket for a single.
Landed fuller on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim shimmies down the track and drives inside out to long off for a single.
Nice and full, floated on off, Rahim lunges forward to defend.
A sharp bumper from Asitha, on top of middle. Najmul Hossain Shanto gets right behind it and punches it onto the pitch.
A bouncer, on top of off, Shanto ducks under.
Goes fuller now, does Asitha, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto prods forward and pushes it across, to the left of the bowler.
Marginally outside off, short, Shanto ducks to let it pass.
On a good length, skidding through the deck, and climbing at the shoulder height of the batter. Najmul Hossain Shanto aborts to play at it and drops his wrists.
Short of a length, at a gentle pace, 129 kph, on off, Najmul Hossain Shanto hops on the toes and drops it on the pitch with soft hands.
Just outside off, on a length, Mushfiqur Rahim rocks back and punches it to short cover.
Closer to the off pole, on a length. Mushfiqur Rahim waits for the ball to arrive and blocks off the back foot.
Full again, outside leg, Najmul Hossain Shanto sweeps this to deep fine leg for a single.

Dropped fuller and on middle, Mushfiqur Rahim sweeps it along the ground to deep square leg for a single. This brings up the 150-run partnership between Shanto and Rahim! The two experienced men have gotten along nicely so far without being troubled much by the bowlers.
Identical line and length, punched away to point.
Short of a length, around off, turning away a shy bit. Mushfiqur Rahim rocks back and punches it to short cover.
This one kisses off the deck, but outside off, on a length. Najmul Hossain Shanto gets inside the line of the ball to leave it alone.
Hits the short length again, on the stumps. Najmul Hossain Shanto hops across and drops it right in front of him.
Same length, same line, ducked by Shanto again.
At 128 kph, short and on top of middle, Najmul Hossain Shanto dodges this by sitting under it.

FOUR! SHOT! Through the gap! Another short delivery, from over the stumps, climbing on the batter's body, Najmul Hossain Shanto controls the pull shot and pins the gap perfectly between deep fine leg and deep backward square leg for a boundary.
Short and outside leg from around the stumps. Mushfiqur Rahim nudges it to the right of square leg for an easy single.

FOUR! A very productive first over for Bangladesh this! Tharindu Rathnayake bowls it short and outside off. Gets some extra bounce on a shorter length. Najmul Hossain Shanto is taken aback by the extra lift and just about manages to cut it late and past short third. A long chase for the fielder from the inner ring, but the ball has enough wheels on it to go to the fence.
BEATEN! Flatter and fuller, just outside off, going straight on. Najmul Hossain Shanto is early in his sweep shot and is beaten.
At just 82 kph, full and tossed up on middle. Najmul Hossain Shanto defends it back to the bowler.
Bowled fuller and around off, Mushfiqur Rahim drives it along the ground for a single at long off.
Slides on the pads, on a length, Najmul Hossain Shanto rocks back and wrists it to the backward square leg region for a single.
Short and spinning away from off, Mushfiqur Rahim hangs back and cuts it past cover-point for a single.
Too slow, and on the leg stump line. Mushfiqur Rahim flicks this easily to deep mid-wicket for a single. And that will be TEA ON DAY 1!
Goes across off, fuller, left alone by Rahim.
